1123.content: You woke up dizzy with not memories about what happenned before...And you realized you were...shrunk ! probably the size of a coackroach in a room of Capsule corporation. You began to scream as you looked up from the table you were, as a giant woman looked at you...
1123.title: Shrunken you and Giant Bulma

11231.content:
What just happened? One minute you were walking down the street minding your own business and the next thing you knew you were waking up in this mysterious location.

Extremely much dizzy and drowsy you slowly get to your feet as your vision returns and becomes much more clear. Everything gets less fuzzy and comes into view, you take a few steps forward but suddenly trip over something. Falling flat on your face you look around to see what caused you to fall, our heart dropped.
..it was a pencil.

Panicking you stand back up and look all around you. Your fears were confirmed, surrounding you was a pencil, a ruler and some beakers, except all thee items were hundreds of times their normal size.

You then ran to the end of the platform you were on and looked over the side, in front of you was a massive chair which confirmed that you were indeed Shrunk and placed on a table. Hell you couldn’t have been more than an inch tall at most!

Panting heavilly you began to pace back and forth with your head in between your hands wondering just what the hell was going on. Because of this it took a few moments for you to notice thst your were enveloped in a massive shadow. Snapping out of your stupor you look up to the heavans to see a gigantic yet beautiful blue haired woman staring down at you with a smile on her face.

“Oh good you’re awake! I was worried you wouldn’t wake up!”

The woman’s booming voice hurt your ears slightly as you covered them in shock. The woman noticed this and giggled to herself.

“Oooooosie! Sorry I forgot that at your size you’re more fragile, don’t worry sweetie I’ll soesk a lot quieter for you Ok hihi”

You couldn’t belive what you were seeing, a gigantic blue haired woman was towering high above you and essentially patronising you, angered you began shouting up at her. The blue haired woman noticed this and laughed once again.

Hihi sorry little guy I can’t hear you from all the way up here! Hold on a sec I’ll come down to your level!”

With that said the collossal woman lowered her billboard sized face down towards you, now you knew you should run but the sight of this beautiful blue haired woman looming towards you was a sight you didn’t want to miss.

The woman then got as close as she could and smiled at you. My god she was huge! She could swallow you whole with ease if she wanted to! As you stood frozen in fear and curiosity the giant woman began to speak in a low soft whisper that was still fairly loud to you.

“Much better now I should I be able to hear you a lot better sweetie. Now I’m sure you have a lot of questions so I think i should explain myself now. My name is Bulma I’m a scientist and right now I’m conducting an experiment for a brand new Shrink ray! Now I already made one when I was...slightly younger but now that I’m more mature and smarter I decided to give it another go, right now I wanted to test it on a living being but there wasn’t exactly a whole lotta people that wanted to get Shrunk hihi, so I simply chose a random person off the street and here we are! Don’t worry though I won’t let anything happen to you little guy, but I do need your co-operation of this is gonna work. So can I count on you sweetie?”

You couldn’t belive what you were hearing! This woman had essentially kidnapped you, Shrunk you and was now experimenting on you without your consent! You had half a mind to scream your lungs off at her but you knew that would get you nowhere. Instead you thought about your options, on one had you could indulge her I mean she was beautiful and since she was a scientist you were sure she could return you back to normal right? On the other hand you didn’t know this woman and for all you knew she was gonna experiment and torture you and you couldn’t have that so maybe you should try and run to get some help.

After a few moments of contemplation you decided to...
11231.title: Bulma’s Science Experiment

112311.content:
"*Sigh......Ok, fine, I'll do it." You said. Bulma grew a smile on her face, she's happy with your answer.

"Yes! She yelled out. You covered your ears as she shouted. "Oops! Sorry about that." You were mostly nervous that you might be killed from her experiments, but she did say she's learned more about shrinking. However you had to ask her about any risks.

"So, Bulma, are you sure I'm going to be ok?" You asked nervously.

"Of course! I did tests on non-living objects before I decided on you. Every single object I tested has completely passed these tests. So I hypothesis it cold work on living beings too!" Bulma responded.

"What kind of tests?" You asked. Bulma didn't say anything for a few seconds, she wanted to soften the blow for you since she was afraid that you might chicken out.

"Well, Some of it might be a bit....embarrassing. You won't mind them, will you? Bulam said with a concerned tone in her voice.

"That's something you should know about me. When I make a promise, I intend to keep it." You said reassuring Bulma. "You look like a trustworthy woman who intends to do no harm and I believe it." Bulma smiled at your response. It seems you made her happy and plus, she was blushing a little bit.

"Terrific!" Bulma said happily. "Let me explain how this is going to work: There are 5 tests and you can select any one you want to do:

The first test is a pressure test. During this, I'll test out how much pressure you can take with my hand, my feet or my.....breasts...and....butt......It will also test your flexibility and endurance while this happens.

The second test is a digestive test. I will put you in my mouth and swallow you. You objective is go through my digestive system and exit out. If anything does go wrong, I have these pills that will force me to throw you up. If you don't mind, I also want you to collect some samples of my stomach acids as well as food I've already ingested.

The third test is a bloodstream test. I'll inhale you through my nose and travel to my lungs. Your objective is to travel through my bloodstream and enter my heart. From there, you have to obtain a blood sample from me."

"Wait, why do I have to get a blood sample from your heart?" You asked. "Why not while in your bloodstream?"

"Glad you asked!" Bulma said immediately. Looks like she was prepared to answer a similar question. " The reason is that most of my important cells will be transported from different parts of my body, like white blood cells and platelets, which helps the body repair any cuts."

"The fourth test is a bit.....embarrassing." Bulma blushed as she said that and was a little embarrassed. " This test is a......womb test. As the name suggests, I'll put you in my vagina and you'll have to enter my womb. I want you to grab a sample of my egg as well as the coating within my vagina." You too, blushed at the thought. You just met and now she wants you to enter a private part of her body. You liked the idea and she was very beautiful, but you didn't want to take advantage of her.

"The final test is ear canal test. I'll put you in my ear and you'll travel down my ear canal to my ear drum. I want you to collect some earwax from me."

"Why earwax?" You asked.

" I don't know, there might be some uses for earwax that can be used for good or probably find an alternative way to get rid of earwax without using cotton swabs." Bulma replied. " Oh, right, I almost forgot. As I said before, I tested it on every non-living thing like a table or a basketball or a refrigerator. They all passed these tests, but I couldn't get some of them out of me."

"So your saying that you have like a piano in your bloodstream or a sink still inside in your stomach or a beach ball in your ear.?" You asked.

" Well they're inanimate objects. They can't exactly move." Bulma replied. "It would be a great help if you can get them out for me." She then reach into her pockets and pulled out something and gave it to you. It was a vile. You expected this was how you had to get the sample if you chose the other 4 tests.

"I'm guessing this vile was shrunk, and it's unbreakable?" You asked Bulma.

" Yep! If you don't believe me, try and break it." Bulma said. You took that offer. With the vile in your hands, you simply dropped the vile on the ground, but it didn't shatter. It was completely intact! No scratches or marks whatsoever! You picked up the vile again and this time, you threw it on the ground. It landed on the ground with a loud ring, but it didn't shatter. There wasn't any damage on it! It was completely fine.

"Okay, I believe you." You said. "Oh and my name is *Y/N*. (Y/N is short for "Your name".)

"Well then *Y/N", I'm happy for your cooperation!" Bulma said happily. "So, what test do you want to do?"

After carefully thinking, you decided to go for the.....

A: Pressure test

B: Digestive test

C: Bloodstream test

D: Womb test

E: Ear Canal test
112311.title: FOR SCIENCE!!!

choices: Bulma choose how this test will go on
Bulma changes her mind and decides to pick another test against your will
1123111.content:
thinking deeply for a moment you decided to choose : " The pressure test "

" hmmm are you sure about that ? It might hurt you thought you won't die as i said. But it can be too much for your mind to endure. So even if i can assure your physical body, i can't assure about you will react after this " The woman said honestly.

" Yeah i'm sure. Beside if i have to turn crazy or be destroyed in my mind, i'm sure you'll help me right ? "

" Of course i'll do my best, but i'm a scientist, not a doctor. So i ask you again : are you sure ? "

" Yes" you replied thought that you got scared by the consequences she just mentionned.

" All right then, we'll do things this way : "


1) From the high to the ground : Hand first, butt seconds, and feet third

1123111.title: Pressure Test

choices: Bulma spits you out, just to taste you again
1123112.content:
You took a small deep breath as you decided on which to pick. As much as you didn't like the idea of going into her ear to get earwax, you avoided that option completely leaving you with the other ones.

Scratching your head you crossed your arms as you finally decided. "Okay, I've decided on which test to do."

Bulma's eyes lit up with curiosity and joy as she waited on you to give her a answer on which you picked.

Looking at Bulma and the expression on her face, you couldn't help but feel a little proud that you were going to help her of all people. You didn't stall any longer as you cleared your throat as he sheepishly point to her stomach.

"Well then, that's a good pick." Bulma said with a small smile as her stomach growled as if it were knowing it would be getting fed soon. "Oh, right on queue."

You looked down at Bulma's belly after it had growled, you saw her place a hand over it as she rubbed it gently. "Y-Yeah I guess so..."

Bulma lifted you up over her mouth shortly after as she opened her mouth widely and stuck her tongue out. You looked down at the dark void of Bulma's mouth but soon felt her tipping her hand as you slid off, Bulma watched you fall as she felt you plop onto her tongue.

"This should be fun.." You said sarcastically under your breath, not wanting Bulma to hear you.

Bulma brought her tongue back into her mouth with you now on it. She then closed her mouth sealing you inside, you waited for her to gulp you down as you sat there on her tongue. However Bulma started to taste you first to get an idea of your flavor before sending you down to her stomach.

You were being tossed around in Bulma's mouth as her tongue wrapped over you and around you. "W-Whoa hey now."

Bulma giggled a bit as she found you pretty tasty actually. "MMM..so good."

You felt the joy ride stop as you were now laying on her tongue as you wondered if she was going to swallow you or not.
1123112.title: Tasting

choices: Bulma wants to make your body more resistant
Bulma checks your body, as you keep yelling at her
You are able to escape when she's not looking at you
you offer her to be her slave in exchange to not be her "experiment subject"
112312.content:
You decided to run away from her. You cared about your life and freedom so much that you didn't see how stupid your action was. The gigantic woman felt offended as she was looking at you running on the table, where you couldn't jump or hide from her.

" Are you going somewhere ? " she asked in a cold tone. You stopped as soon as you realized that you couldn't escape. You considered to try to reason with the gigantic woman, after all even if you could escape, she was the only one able to restore your size. You turned back to her, trying to think about something to explain your first reaction.

" Listen Ms...Bulma right ? I'm sorry i didn't mean to offend you or something, i just don't want to be that small...And i don't want you to use me for your experiments, so i'm begging you...Please give me back my size and let me go " You implored, hoping the woman was enought human to understand your feelings.

"Hmmm...." Bulma crossed her arms, thinking about your request. " I can't do that. " she started sealing your fate already. " I could shrink someone else, he will make the same speech as you. That's why i've decided to shrink a random personn, too bad it happenned to you. Sorry sweetie,"

You couldn't believe your ear, but at last she didn't sound like a psyho or something...She tried to explain her point with you, which meant she was probably not that bad (just "Probably" in your mind). But you tried to defend yourself one more time : " why don't just shrink some criminals ? I don't deseve this situation ! "

" You make a point. But it's too late, i've shrunk you, i won't waste my time to grow you back and find a criminal to shrink instead. Now come here. " Bulma's giant hand came for you and you felt her fingers wrapping your whole body before you felt yourself trapped in a prison of chair. A woman was holding you in her hand, and you couldn't do anything against that ! The giantess then stuck you with a piece of tape on the table in front of her, and she sat on her chair. You had no idea what she was about to do...
112312.title: Run away from her!

1123122.content:
Running away had proven to be quite the futile effort as you had gotten no further than a few steps beofre reality had set in, at your size there was literally no where for you to go and to make matters worse reasoning with the giantess fell on deaf ears. She didn’t seem like a bad personality but the fact she had told you that you were stuck being her little guinea pig didn’t exactly ease you. Now here ku were taped to a table with this woman sat across from you with a notepad and pen at the ready. What was she going to do?

“Erm excuse me...miss Bulma? Maybe we got off on the wrong foot, I’m sure my poor manners were just a result of me being shocked at my Er...temporary size...”

You purposely but enthuses on the word temporary hoping it would get a reassuring response from the mad scientist. To your dissapointment she didn’t even flinch as she kept checking her notes as she occasionally made the odd sound. You attempted to talk to her again but once more she ignored you as she kept working away at her notes. After a few more failed attempts you finally lost your temper and shouted at the titanic woman.

“HEYYYYY LOOK AT ME YOU BITCH ARE YOU GONNA TURN ME BACK OR NOT!!!!!!!”

Finally Bulma showed some kind of reaction as she looked up from her notepad and looked over to the table you were taped to.

“Hmmmm? Oh right I almost forgot about you! Sorry sweetie I’ll be over in a second Ok?”

With that Bulma set down her notepad and stood up to her full intimidating height. Even though you were scared of this titanic woman you couldn’t help but once again notice how beautiful you was. Which was a problem as you needed to find a way to get back to normal and not focus all your attention on her beauty!

Bulma soon came close to you and smiled as she looked you over.

“Well sweetie I guess it’s time, I’ve left you here long enough so let’s do this.”

“Oh great I was worried you were serious before. Now how are you going to restore me back to normal size?”

“Sweetie I told you before that I had no intention of unshrinking you, so the sooner you get that through your head the better. Now let’s get your physical examination over with Ok?”

You couldn’t believe what you were hearing, this crazy bitch was actually gonna keep you small and experiment on you. Well you weren’t gonna hold your feelings in, you opened your mouth ready to scream at the blue haired woman when suddenly you had the breath knocked out of you as bulma pressed her fingernail right on your chest.

“That’s it open nice and wide! I need to make sure everything’s ok with your body now that it’s so small hihi”


The wind was knocked right out of you as Bulma continued to poke and prod at your body. Each touch was like a small car hitting you as you lay there unable to move. After a few minutes Bulma stopped poking at you and proceeded to stand up and make her way back to her chair. She sat down and began writing down more notes.

As you began to catch your breath you thought of exactly what you wanted to say to your gigantic captor, but beofre you could speak Bulma interrupted you.

“Well it seems like your body is in perfect order! I’m glad my shrink ray has worked so perfectly. Not only has it made you ten times as durable as someone twice your original size but it’s made you much much cuter hihi”

Bulma s statement took you by surprise, sure it was nice to know you were at least safe at this size but she also found you cute? What kind of messed up abduction was this? As you were putting everything she said together you only half heard what she said next.

“I still have to work out the bugs for the next test subject, it’s a shame you won’t grow back to your original height.”

“Wait what?...WHAT DO YOU MEAN I WONT GROW BACK!!!!! YOU HAVE TO FIX THIS YOU CRAZY BLUE HAIRED BITCH!!!!!!”


You were beyond angry, this woman has kidnapped you, shrunken you and now had no way to turn you back???? This was nightmare Andy you had no intention of staying put. Using all of your strength you managed to break free of your tape and rip it off your body. You then took off as fast as you could across the table. This didn't go unnoticed as Bulma looked over at you with a disappointed look on her face.

“Really? You’re gonna trynand runaway again? Sweetie I gave you a chance but if you don’t stop running I’m gonna have to do something that you really won’t like”

You took no notice of her as you kept running and reached the end of the table, you then threw caution to the wind and jumped down landing with a soft thud on the ground. To your delight you were unhurt and kept running away. Meanwhile Bulma had risen from her chair and wa s looming over you with some kind of gun in hand?

“I tried to warn you sweetie so don’t blame me for what’s to happen.”

Bulma pointed the gun at you an pulled the trigger. A blue beam shot out of it and mad dots way towards you and...
1123122.title: Tiny Check-Up

choices: Bulma places her hand under you..and keeps you in her pocket for a while
You land on the ground...Alive. Bulma is satisfied..somehow
You were too angry to realize that you have jumped in her chair, on her leg
You stopped.Maybe she will accept to do some pleasant things for you later...
11231221.content:
You get touched by the blue beam coming from Bulma's gun, and your whole environnement became...bigger. As if your shrunken size was not enought, you were now smaller, similar to an ant you guessed. You didn't have time to focus on that, there was something that obviously got your attention. The loud footsteps of the impossibly huge woman coming to you ! She was like your whole world now, and you began to scream again...only problem is that you can't be hear by her, or anyone now.

Bulma sighed, she looked annoyed. She put the gun on her desk and bent down over you.

" That's all your fault, not mine. YOUR fault " She said, not feeling guilty at all about your situation. Bulma was a scientist, and a scientist had to make some sacrifices for the sake of her research. Only problem is that you never asked to be one of HER sacrifices ! You instinctively tried to run again, and Bulma knew exactly how to catch someone of your size. She put her index finger inside her mouth and get it out covered of her salive, then place her monstuous fingertip on you. Your whole body get stuck on the tip of her index, and Bulma raised you to her face.

" I know you're supposed to be more resistant, but now that i've shrunk you again, i won't take any risk...Maybe i should work on something else ? " She asked mostly to herself, since she couldn't hear you anyway.

Bulma headed to her chair and place you on the spot you were before, only this time everything was bigger.

" hmmm...i think it may be frustrating for you to not be heard, maybe i should work on that first. It would be easy for me to shrink a micro you'll keep stuck on the corner of your mouth, while i'll keep one in my ear...But only if you get more polite with me, and show me more respect ! " She warned in annoyance.

There were no words to explain how you felt right now, after all you went throught against your will, she was now making you her disciplined little bitch ! You didn't want to live like this, and the first thing you knew you would ask once she gives you a micro, was to let you die....But wait...if you were not as resistant as before...maybe you could solve the problem by jumping off the desk again, with hope that you'll get killed by the impact. You had to make a choice....at last she was beautiful, so living with her might be pleasant in the future. On the otherside, you'll never grow back again and won't get a normal life. Thinking about that you began to run toward the edge, while Bulma was checking something in her drawer. She noticed you, but it was too late :

" What are you...?! Noooo ! "

You jumped, this time it was not an attempt to escape, but an attempt to die as even Bulma didn't know if your body will resist the fall with your new size....
11231221.title: Hit and Shrunk You!

112312211.content:
This was it. You had made your choice and now here you were flying through the air towards the cold unforgiving floor, at least your death will be quick and painless. How did it get to this? Well Bulma the scientist kidnapping and shrinking you...twice, without consent may be one reason. Alas it mattered not as in a few short seconds the sweet cold embrace of death would overcome you as your fragile ant sized body struck the ground...or so that’s hat you wanted to happen.

No sooner had you jumped off the desk had the now immensely gigantic Bulma spin around on her chair and stuck her massive hand out to catch you. Instead of the cold embrace of death you instead landed onto soft and warm canvas of her enormous hand, it was here you realised how insignificant you really were as Bulmas hand was the size of a small field to you. After a few seconds of gathering your thoughts you felt a shift in moment as ant scientist raised her hand up to her colossal face. Oh boy this was definitely not the scenario you envisioned when you attempted to jump to your death. Now your were staring into the eyes of a beautiful yet angry titanic woman.

“What the hell do you think you’re doing?! You could’ve been killed! I told you I was unsure of whether or not you were still resilient at this size. Just what were you thinking?!”

The giantesses word rained down like thunder as your fragile ears nearly burst from her scolding, however even though she was yelling you could still detect a hint of worry in her voice. Maybe she did care about despite the circumstances.

Bulma stopped yelling and looked at the little bug sized man in her hand, even though she was upset she was still glad he was ok. It didn’t now take long for her to figure out why he had done what he did, clearly being this small was unbearable for him, so much that he’d rather take his own life. Bulma did feel bad but she had decided when she started this experiment that she was going to see it through to the end no matter what. But that didn’t mean she couldn’t do make this experiment worthwhile for both of them.

“Ok ok Sweetie I understand. This can’t be easy for you and I’m sure at that size you think you’re life is over, but it’s only over if you give in. You need to embrace this new size, think of all the things you can do that others can’t! In fact why don’t you think about all the possibilities whilst I finish this paperwork? I know why don’t I out you somewhere more private!”

With that said Bulma took her little test subject and lowered him towards her lab coat, from there she opened her inside coat pocket and prepared to put her little subject there.

“Right here we go sweetie I’m gonna leave you in my pocket for a little while where you can think of some fun new ways to use your size. I’ll check up on you later ok?”

You didn’t even get a say in the matter (like she could hear you anyway) as you found yourself falling from her warm hand and into the dark abyss of her lab coat pocket. After a short fall you landed on an even softer layer of fabric that you figured was the bottom of the pocket. Looking up you saw the sky filled with Bulmas beautiful face as she winked at you before zipping the pocket shut enveloping you in darkness.

Bulma proceeded to get back to her paperwork eager to right down her findings from the experiment so far. You on the other hand stuck in her pocket decided you might as well catch a few Z’s as you slowly nodded off.

A few hours later

“Wakey wakey sweetie I’ve got a surprise for you!”

The booming yet soft voice of Bulma woke you from your stupor, to your surprise you were back in the warm palm of Bulma’s hand. You also deduced you were no longer in her lab.

Where were you?
112312211.title: Bulma’s Pocket Ant

114.content: Who will she use it ?
114.title: Bulma shrinks someone else

choices: Bug size is too big. Shrink him more
Catch the ship and put in her pocket
Jaco manages to avoid her hand, but crash somewhere on her body
1141.content:
Bulma was wondering what to do when someone entered her lab, an alien form which was familiar to Bulma mainly because he was used to annoy her.

"Jaco !! Make a phone call next time you come on Earth, and mostly in my lab when i'm working on something ! " She said as a greeting.

" Phone call, what's that ?! Anyway it' a part of my job to spy on suspect people to make sure they're not messing with the galactic
laws ! " Jaco replied, which didn't help Bulma to calm down. " Do you mean that i'm suspected of something ?! "

" Well, you are working on something right ? Considering you are a brillant scientist, i have to check what you are working on, so i can tell you if you have my agreement to use your invention or not !"

Bulma grabbed her gun and smirked. "wanna check it, huh ? "

Jaco had a step back by seeing the gun : " It's ok you have my agreement !! you...you can use it !! "

" Thanks Jaco ! " Bulma fired at him but he was luckily enought fast to avoid it. The door was not as it suddenly shrunk in front of Jaco. " Wait...that's a shrinking gun ?! "

" Indeed ! " Bulma aimed the gun at him, but was already running as fast possible. Bulma ran after throught her whole house, yelling at him to come back but of course he didn't. Jaco finally joined the outside and jumped inside his small spaceship, scared to be shrunk around this human ! He managed to make it fly just in time, at last that's what he thought at first when he a strong light blinded him for several seconds. When Jaco openned his eyes again, all he could see from the windows was a pair of leg in a jean, walking toward him.

" No no no !!! She really did it !!"

Bulma laughed by seeing the flying little ship reaching her hips, then her belly. " Now it's time for you to respect me and my work ! " She said with a smirk.


What happen ?
1141.title: Bulma shrinks Jaco

choices: Tries to run but Bulma's mother appears to bring some drinks !
Jaco goes under the table and thinks about a plan
11412.content:
Jaco was in fear but didn't want to end up with a giant Bulma ! He tried to send an emergency call when suddenly the ship shook as hard as possible, and Jaco more than a minute to regain conscious. He clearly saw what just happenned by seeing throught the window a giant blue eye looking at him.

" What did you do to my ship ?! You'll be punished for that i swear !! " he yelled confident...somehow. The giant woman only laughed and shook the ship nicely only to remind him who's in charge.

"Sorry can't hear you, but it seems you were yelling at me. " She said.. Jaco tried to do something, anything which could be helpfull in this hopeless situation, but...everything was broken, he couldn't even calls his comrades anymore. " Iwhat can i doooooooo ?! "

" Guess what i'll keep you in that ship for a while, my friends are coming soon for lunch, so stay still and don't try anything stupid ! " Bulma warned before placing the ship in her jean's pocket, not caring about the shock caused to the little alien inside by her simple move.

Jaco decided to not give up and tried to fix his ship from the inside, at least to send his emergency call. He tried different things while yelling and complaining for about an hours, but it was not an easy task as Bulma was always walking or having some moves which caused shock. But when Jaco realized that Bulma was sitting probably having some lunch with her friends as she said, he started to think about another option.

Meanwhile, Bulma had a lunch on her huge balcony with Chichi, Videl and 18. It was a beautiful day and they all had a "women conversation" while eating, about different things that Jaco was already annoyed to hear. That's when suddenly, the ship brutally fell from Bulma's pocket, landing hardly on the hard ground, breaking it once and for all.
Jaco felt dizzy again by the shock, but strangely, he was left on the ground. He expected Bulma to pick it up, but it seems that she was too focused in her conversation...she didn't realize what just happenned !

" Maybe that's my lucky day after all !! " Jaco said and jumped out the ship throught the broken window. He was right, Bulma was still talking it was not a trick or anything.

"héhéhé !! "

“Now hold on there, mortal. Perhaps we can come up with an arrangement.” Zamasu said coming up with an idea.

“What do you mean?” Mai wondered while holding him tightly.

“What I mean is I would like to make a deal with you.” Zamasu said.

“A deal? Are you kidding me? You and Black tormented us and our planet and now you want to make deals with us?” Trunks yelled not happily.

“Hear me out. When I witnessed you defeating my counterpart, a part of me was actually impressed by your accomplishment. Now here you are with me in your mortal grip. Astonishing indeed.” Zamasu said.

“Where are you going with this?” Mai asked him.

“To make it simple, I want you by my side.” Zamasu said shocking the humans.

“You can’t be serious!” Trunks said.

“I am indeed serious. Your name is Mai, correct? You may not be a saiyan, but your capabilities do make up for it in your size. You could make an excellent replacement for my counterpart.” Zamasu said.

“Still, why would I join you after everything you’ve done?” Mai wondered not liking this deal.

“Why to make you the most powerful human in the cosmos. Us working together, you’ll be unstoppable. If you want, I’ll even leave this planet alone for good and even use the Super Dragon Balls to revive those we’ve killed.” Zamasu said .

“Don’t listen to him, Mai!” Bulma yelled out.

“Yeah! He’s just trying to use you as a weapon! You’re not like that! I know it!” Trunks said.

Mai agrees with Trunks and Bulma for she doesn’t trust Zamasu as far as she can throw him. And that’s a far throw with her size. However, this maybe the one chance to protect them and this planet.

Mai felt both nervous and relieved. Nervous at the fact that this self proclaimed ''god'' was going focus squarely on her, and relieved at the fact that the remnants of humanity were being spared, at least for the moment.

"I must say that I never would've thought that you... a mere mortal would actually be capable of defeating my fellow god." Zamasu said with frightening calm. "You humans truly are a dangerous species."

"What can I say, we won't keel over for anyone, even a god." Mai stated firmly to try and disguise her growing worry. This Zamasu character was a complete mystery. Obviously he and Black were in cahoots, but that was all she really knew. He just showed up out of the blue and was now going to deal with her and the rest of humanity personally.

"I can sense your growing fear you know. Mortals, such cowardly creatures. You however, are just plain foolish." Zamasu's eyes narrowed. "I will see to it that you answer for your sins, as well as delaying my zero mortals plan."

"Zero mortals plans?" Mai parroted.

"Yes." the ''god'' nodded. "And once the biggest threat has ben neutralized it can continue unimpeded."

Before Mai could even think she tossed trunks into her mouth and jumped out of the path of KI beam. The path of carnage it left behind was immense as it vaporized an entire city block.

"What!?"

Mai's eyes widened a fraction when she saw no trace of Black. Not even blood. She then checked the underside of her boot just to make sure, and much to her own shock and horror the enemy of humanity was nowhere to be found. Frantically the giant began to survey the ground below for any sign of her arch-enemy.

"Something's not right." Trunks stated seriously as he watched his girlfriend scan the area.

"What do you mean?" Bulma asked. She then looked back to Mai to see not a look of victory, but one of anxiety. "Why is she...?"

"I don't sense Black's energy." Trunks answered with narrowed eyes. Try as he might he couldn't find the Goku impersonator. Right now all he could see where dilapidated buildings and a worried Mai alone admits the destruction. "He's still alive."

"Seriously!? Even after Mai crushed him like a cockroach!?" Bulma panicked.

"Yeah!" the last of the saiyans nodded, his fists tightening. "And just like a cockroach he found a way to survive."

"Oh no." the older woman whispered.

Mai continued to look around anxiously for her missing opponent only to find she was well and truly alone. "Where on earth did he go!?"

The giantess tensed as she braced for a sneak attack. Somehow he avoided certain death beneath her boot and was now lying in wait to catch her off guard. Well she wasn't born yesterday, she'd be ready. At least... she hoped so.

Unbeknownst to her, the monster humanity feared was traveling right under her notice. Had she paid closer attention, she would've noticed the small hole left in her footprint.

"I'm going to go help her!" Trunks stated, ready to fly off.

"Trunks wait--"

"Whuh!?"

"Damn it! Where is he!?" Mai growled.

"Looking for me mortal!?" A familiar voice mocked from behind.

"Bastard!" Mai roared ready to deck him, only to freeze on the spot. In front of her floated Black, looking rougher than she'd ever seen him. His clothes were a disheveled mess and he had more than a few bruises and cuts along his arms and face. But what stood out most was what was in his grasp.

"Trunks? Bulma?" she whispered.

"That's right." Black smirked. Floating unconscious in a golden energy sphere was none other than the last living members of the Briefs' family.

Mai felt herself begin to tremble in a mixture of rage and fear. "Monster."

"Double jeopardy mortal. Surrender and I'll make your end swift... if you don't, then you'll witness you friends' molecules fry."

Mai bit her lip. What did she do?

12121.content:
Chi-Chi had worked herself into a frenzy, her husband had left to go training on another planet, and would probably be gone for months, and her youngest child was spending time at his friend's house, and she was all alone with no one around for miles. It was the downside of living in such a rural area, your closest neighbors were a fifteen minute drive away, and with the lack of any person to mother, or berate for not working, she had become completely, unbearably bored.

"Damn it, Goku! The least you could do is pay your wife a visit every once in a while!" Chi-Chi cursed out her husband. Other than basic household chores, there was nothing at all to keep her mind occupied. Even television had become unwatchable, as ever show seemed to run together in a mish-mash of RGB vomit.

"Guess I'll go outside and see if there is anything that needs doing on the house," the housewife sighed before she headed out the door.

*****

The micro band was the worst purchase he had ever made in his life. The man who had sold it to him had said it would allow him to get into places that no one else could, he should have known that it was faulty by the hints of water damage on the outer casing of the device. It was probably stolen or something, but he couldn't say no to it. He had come out to the country to test it out unseen, and it had worked for the most part, shrinking him down to a few inches in height, but when he went to enlarge himself, the thing smoked and sparked, a broken piece of scrap. Now he was stuck out in the middle of hicksville with no way of getting home. He could only try to find help before he was eaten by a bird or something.

There was a small homestead just a short walk away (at normal size), if he recalled, and when he drove by, it looked like someone was home. He turned in the direction of the house, and began the long walk there.

*****

Upon further inspection, Chi-Chi only found one thing to do, de-weeding around the house, and after getting her work gloves, started to pull the things up, root and all. The work was slow going, as the mound of weeds in her basket grew every minute and there seemed to be no end to them.

While the bored, and tired housewife toiled away on the lawn, she noticed something in the grass ahead of her. She stalked up to it like a cat, on her hands and knees, silently closing in on the source. Her eyes locked on to the tiny moving form of something on her lawn. Her arm raised high, ready to snatch whatever it was. She wouldn't put up with any rats in her house, and she wasn't some squeamish little girl that she would shy away from getting rid of it. Her honed reflexes kicked in once she was within striking distance, her hand shot out, and snatched the thing with ease.

Lifting it up to her face, Chi-Chi got her first good look at the mystery creature.

"Please! You've got to help me!" said the panicked little man in her grasp as he struggled against her grip. "I've shrunken and I can't get back to normal!"

143.content:
As 18 inspected the device in her hands, pondering the naughty fun she could have teasing her husband, she noticed a large yellow button, marked with black stripes, a white letter “G” decaled across it. 18 was cutious - this was a shrinking gun, with sliders & a trigger for easy use, so what was with this bright button that stuck out like a sore thumb?

“What is this now?” she pondered aloud, “Bulma really should put an instruction manual out with these things.” 18 tapped the hornet-colored button ever so lightly, and in response, a purple ray shot out almost immediately, with a speed not unlike that of the Z Fighters she associated with. The beam struck 18’s vanity mirror and rebounded towards her direction at an upward angle; normally, she could dodge such a blast with ease, but caught in surprise, 18 could not dodge the violet burst, and it struck her in the forehead. She fell towards the ground, her rear impacting the carpet, and rubbed her forehead in startled shock - the gun flew from her hands under her bed, far back towards the backboard, where reaching it would be a struggle. “Damn!” she spoke, “That was a bad idea. I’ll avoid that button next time & stick with the shrinking func-“

18 abruptly stopped her thought as she felt a rumbling take place in her body, a strange, tingly sensation; a crawling feeling had begun under her skin, and continued to perpetuate for longer than it should have. Before she could even think about what that feeling meant, 18 began to feel a tough constriction around her body, the feeling of something wrapping around her, trying to indent into her skin - it didn’t take long for 18 to realize that her clothes were beginning to constrict around her body, a light discomfort following through. “Wha...?” was all she could manage to say, as she watched her jeans shrink & tear up her legs, and holes begin to form in her shirt; the room was rapidly shrinking as well, which put her in danger of running out of space. 18’s body pressed up against the back of the bed, without her movement to do so, and she began to feel the wooden frame’s edge travel down the small of her exposed back; it didn’t take long for 18 to realize what was happening to her after that. “Oh, great,” she mused, “That must have been the growing failsafe button, wonderful.”

18 felt a slight frustration overcome her that she made such an amatuer mistake in playing with Bulma’s contraption, of course there had to be a failsafe on the device, else Bulma’s shrinkees would stay just that, and there would definitely been some ramifications. 18 sighed at her mistake and lurched forward a bit; with the sudden movement atop her continued growth, 18’s shirt broke free of her body, exposing her expensive designer’s bra to the open air, and her pants were soon to follow, the matching panties to go with it. Both pieces of underwear strained harder & harder as she expanded, and 18 felt a sensation of frustration overcome her, that her expensive designer underwear would be destroyed because of a simple mistake she made, on top of the fact she was now going to become a giant. Before she could continue her angry thought, 18 felt a piece of semi-hard material crash into her head; she yelped a small “Ouch!” and lurched downward, the movement that finally broke her underwear and sent it flying across the room, leaving her totally nude. 18’s body continued to expand & fill the room as she rubbed her head, noting the indent in the ceiling her cranium made, and she begun to use her free hand & feet to brace herself against the walls, pushing against them in an attempt to gain space, but no effect of such happening. 18 could only be thankful that Krillin & Marron were not home, instead playing down at the park, as she would probably reach an apex to her frustration had they seen her in such an embarrasing situation, but 18 recognized the possibility of breaking out of the house and exposing her nude, gigantic body to her neighbors was a very real possibility, which was far worse; 18 closed her eyes and braced herself for the worst, accepting the fact she would be embarrased coming out of this situation either way...

1454.content:
Android 18 laid down on the sandy beach and began taking in the sunlight. The past few weeks had been hard for her. 18, along with her twin brother, now known as Android 17, had been kidnapped and turned into cyborgs. The two were kept prisoner in lab belonging to Dr. Gero, the man who was the creator of the Red Ribbon Androids and responsible for 18 and her brother's ungodly transformation. The two had managed to escape and kill Dr. Gero, only for another one of his creations, a large disgusting beetle by the name of Cell, to hunt them down in order to absorb. Despite their efforts, 17 and 18 ended up absorbed by the bio-android from an alternate timeline and were seemingly trapped in yet another prison.

However, Android 18 found herself being spat out by the disgusting monster and was seemingly given new a chance at life.

It was all blur about what happened afterward, but 18 still kept replaying the thoughts in her mind, hoping to make sense of it all.

"What's next for me?" 18 said as she looked up at the bright blue cloudless sky. "I honestly don't think I have a purpose anymore…"

18 rolled on her side and looked at the vast, empty sandy beach. It was amazing that no one else was enjoying the sun, especially on such a terrific day. 18 was about close her eyes when she saw a two tiny human shaped figures in the distance. She squinted her eyes in order to get a better look at the two far-off creatures, but that's when she realized the unusual.

The couple was standing right in front of her. 18 rose to her knees and looked down at the sandy beach. She rubbed her eyes to make sure she wasn't hallucinating, but she wasn't. Staring up at her, from between her blue-clad knees, was a small man accompanied by a small woman. 18 estimated they could only be about an inch in height.

"Umm, hi," 18 said while waving at the little people. Without waving back, the man stepped forward and formed a funnel over his mouth. He then called up to the seemingly gigantic Android.

"Excuse me, miss! My name is Dan and this my wife Cherry. It seems that we get lost in...a world where people are obviously...bigger. Can you help us?" He asked bravely, thought that her current size was creepy.

18 picked up the little man using her thumb and forefinger and held the man up in front of her face. Was she dreaming? There was no way a person could be this small. How did they get lost there, were they some alien species or something ?. 18 flicked the gently and stared as the man's body lazily swung back and forth.
