No, the prince of all Saiyans did not want to place a bet as he already knew what the outcome would be. With him in this diminished state in the hands of the android, he was essentially helpless.

He tried to struggle free, but the fact of the matter was he was too small to actually get away. 18 put an end to his pointless struggle by jostling him around a bit in her grasp.

Now that the little Saiyan's rebellion had been quelled, it was time to punish him for his lackluster performance. The blonde gave the poor little thing a hard glance before looking down at her bare soles.

She knew what she wanted, and how she was going to get it. She lowered the angry prince towards her left foot and slammed the little man against it.

Vegeta grunted from the impact and groaned from the pressure against his back. The vile woman had actually slammed him against her smelly sole. How dare she!? How dare she do something so revolting to him!?

"Since you couldn't give me a proper massage, you'll just have to satisfy me another way." 18 explained. She took a moment to get used to the feeling of the struggling Saiyan, trying her best not to giggle.

With her nerves calm she began to rub him against her sole. Surprisingly enough Vegeta actually felt kind of nice, even if he did still tickle.

"Wow. You actually feel kind of nice. I honestly expected you to be a little rough."

Vegeta meanwhile was being forced to endure his face being grinded into the rank flesh of the robotic blonde. Up and down his body went across the android's sole, his form picking up small traces of crumbs and sweat.

The prince wanted to scream, he did actually which proved to be a big mistake as some of 18's foot pick-ups landed in his mouth. The taste was rancid and the warrior couldn't spit out the vile mixture fast enough. Never before in his life had he tasted something so disgusting.

He would remember that vile concoction on his tongue for the rest of his life...

18 on the other hand would remember this comfortable feeling for the rest of hers. Silently she hoped Bulma would drop the cure on her way here just so she could enjoy her husband a bit longer. Perhaps she'd ask her if she could take whatever she gave Vegeta home with her for Krillin.

She began to rub harder, faster, the pleasurable feeling of Saiyan against skin was amazing. She knew it wouldn't be for the angry little man, but right now his situation didn't matter.

She eventually switched him over to right foot and repeated the process. Vegeta found himself coated in an even fresher layer of sweat and the stink was now seeping into his hair. Damn this android. Mother or not he'd kill her.

As he endure this horrible torture he wondered what was taking his wife so long. That woman needed to hurry up and get him out of this. Hell, anyone showing up right now to distract the cyborg would be a godsend.

Where was Bulma?
15522331321111221.title: 18's punishment for Vegeta

155223313211112211.content:
Bulma whistled a sweet tune as she entered her lab. Thankfully she remembered to whip up an antidote in advance for husband when she decided to put this trial of hers in motion.

She casual opened the fridge in the corner and carefully removed the vile with the green liquid. To think something that looked just like grape juice could hold so much power.

Science was truly an amazing thing. If used correctly it could bring even the strongest warrior to their knees. Look at what it did to her husband. The prince of all Saiyans was about as threatening as cold soup.

Bulma smiled joyfully at her little creation and held it close before making her way back to her room. Along the way she began to picture what her magnum opus could do against the god of destruction and his flunky.

The image of lord Beerus as a micro kitty made her giggle and the thought of Whis being small enough to fit in the palm of her hand was pure joy. Though now that she thought about it, they might actually enjoy being small.

Knowing them they would for a time. Food would be impossibly large and lord Beerus would probably be in heaven. Whis too if only to experience ice cream on a grand scale.

Now that did sound nice. A giant bowl of ice cream would be like a frozen tundra of deliciousness. If she added cookies to the mix then it would be absolutely perfect.

No doubt Goku would like that too. He could eat like there was no tomorrow. "Hmm? I wonder if Goku could finish an entire bowl of ice cream while tiny?"

Knowing him, he probably could. Though she would worry slightly for him due to his wife's strict nature. It was almost a guarantee she would take full advantage of a mini Goku.

Oh well, this wasn't about Goku. This was about her husband and this ultimate trial. A trial that was a major success by the way.

Bulma smiled. "I hope 18 and Vegeta are getting along."

Probably...

The blue haired woman finally reached her room... and opened the door.
155223313211112211.title: Bulma arrives with the cure

155223313211112213.content:
Bulma whistled a happy tune as she walked through the halls of her happy home. The day had honestly gone much better than expected considering she used her husband as a Guinee Pig for her latest experiment.

Vegeta had reacted pretty much as expected, hotly and demanding to be returned to normal. That man seriously was no fun at times. There was more to life than just training and his stupid rivalry with Goku.

She tried to show him that by having a little fun and the little twerp didn't want to play ball. Because of that she has to hire 18 out of pocket in order to regain the advantage because despite the size difference, Vegeta was still pretty strong.

Oh the fun she and 18 got to have at his expense though when she arrived. The android was just so efficient at taking her husband down and it was honestly really fun to watch. She even got the massage of a lifetime.

Well, as the old saying goes, all good things must come to an end. Sad, but true. She had her fun and now that she knew her size pills were a rousing success, it was time to get Vegeta back to normal.

Right as Bulma reached her lab door she was greeted to a rather odd sight. The door had been cracked open. "That's weird. I wonder if dad came through to borrow some tools again?"

Shrugging it off as nothing, the blue-haired scientist entered her lair. She flipped on the lights and when she did her eyes bulged. Across the room by her fridge was her daughter Bulla guzzling down what appeared to be the antidote!

"Bulla stop!" Bulma shouted as she ran over to the teen.

"Huh?"

"What are you doing!?" Bulma shouted as she snatched the beaker from her hands. "Do you have any idea what you just drank!? I needed this to cure your father?"

"Cure him of what!?" she asked. "I thought this was growth formula."

Bulma sighed. "And why did you think that?"

"Grandma said so."

The bluenette looked so put out. "Of course she did. Well now I need to check you over to make sure there are no side effects. This wasn't meant to be drank by normal size humans... half Saiyans."

Bulla didn't answer. In fact she was looking a bit green in the face. "Hey mom? I don't feel so good."

"Uh no..."
155223313211112213.title: That is so not good...

15522331321112.content:
Bulma sighed as she felt her husband's hands against her foot. Despite he now relatively puny size, he was still surprisingly strong and that meant he didn't have to struggle too much to try and please her.

18 for her part simply observed with an overly smug grin that Vegeta really wanted to smack off her face. It was already bad enough that the iron maiden was in house, he didn't need her looking so smug either.

The prince of all Saiyans took a deep breath and tried to ignore her. She'd get hers in time, he'd make sure of it. Perhaps when this was over he'd 'borrow' some of those shrinking pills and put the robot through the wringer.

"Ah, this feels nice." Bulma commented as her husband began to squeeze harder. It felt incredible the way he used his hands. If only he would put training aside to pleasure her more often.

The prince grumbled, but took some slight satisfaction in that he was still able to get the desired reaction from his wife despite his size. Even normal sized he was a little on the short side which slightly bugged him.

"That's it, keep that up and Bulma will be satisfied in no time." 18 teased. There really was nothing quite like watching the arrogant prince reduced to a mere foot massager.

Vegeta again grumbled, trying desperately to keep his volatile temper in check. All he had to do was make it through this massage and he'd soon be restored. Patience... he had to have patience.

Vegeta was so intently focused on servicing his wife's foot he failed to notice the mischievous gleam in her eyes. While he worked his fingers to the bone on her toes he was unaware of her other rising foot. Or to be more accurate, unaware of her hand sliding back to meet it.

18's grin only grew wider as she watched her friend carefully remove her sock while her husband was distracted. Even though she didn't voice it, 18 had a pretty good idea what Bulma had in mind.

The poor tiny never even noticed the now removed sock dangling ominously above him. Had he, he would've done everything in his power to avoid the oversized garment.

Before he knew it, he'd been consumed by the white cloth. Vegeta didn't know what hit him as his vision when white and he was suddenly hoisted high into the sky. "What the hell...!!"

"Gotcha!" Bulma teased. "Looking down into the depths of the sock revealed the surprised and outraged face of her husband. Clearly Vegeta wasn't all too pleased about being bagged like a prize.

"Woman!? I demand you release me at once!"

"Hmmm?"
15522331321112.title: Off with the sock

choices: Bulma decides to take a walk
Vegeta tears open the sock to freedom
155223313211122.content:
"Not yet, there's just something I have to try first." Bulma stated to her outraged husband. That was clearly the wrong thing to say as the man suddenly went into a fit reminiscent to that of a small child.

He cursed her name and began struggling all about in the sock like a fussy baby. Bulma didn't know whether or not the sight was funny or pathetic. Perhaps a bit of both once she put more thought into it.

"Oh don't be such a baby. You're a Saiyan so act like one." Bulma reprimanded.

That too proved to be the wrong thing to say. "You want to see me act like a Saiyan?" he growled. "Be careful what you wish for--"

The poor little Saiyan didn't even get to finish the rest of his tirade as the opening to the sock was clamped shut. Bulma had had enough of Vegeta's mad ramblings and decided to take control.

She jostled the sock around as if it was sack full of change, bouncing the little prince all around his cotton prison. 18 couldn't help but giggle at the sight of her friend finally taking control on her own.

The blonde was then rewarded to the sight of the teal-haired woman now swing the sock round and round like a yo-yo. She could only imagine what little Vegeta must be experiencing right now.

If she could see him then she would've giggled more at his rapidly greening face and unfocused eyes. He was getting dizzy and wondering when that accursed woman would let him off this crazy ride.

His situation only got worse when he started bouncing. Each time he would hit something hard and then be catapulted back into it again at full force. It didn't really hurt, but it was damn sure annoying.

Back in the outside world Bulma was grinning ear to ear as she used her sock and husband as a paddleball against her fist. Never before had she been so in control before. She started to wonder why she hadn't tired this sooner.

Eventually the fun had to end as she stopped to check on the battered man. Opening the sock reveal just how out of it Vegeta now was. He looked like Chi-Chi the very first time Goku took her out flying.

"You alright in there, Vegeta?" she asked with genuine concern. Concern that quickly went away when Vegeta defiantly flipped her the bird. "Jerk! Well let's see how much you like this!"

The sock lowered and for a moment the disoriented Saiyan wondered if she was about to release him. That thought died as quickly as it appeared because he was greeted to a sight that completely cut off his view of the outside world.

Bulma was putting on her sock...

...With him still in it!

"N-no!" he panicked.

Bulma slowly inserted her foot into the warm cloth and could feel her husband struggling valiantly beneath her sole. The sock had firmly crushed him against her and the now taller woman could only giggle at the ticklish sensation.

"Wow." 18 commented with wide eyes. "That was cold blooded."

"What do you think I should do now?"
155223313211122.title: Dominator

choices: Bulma puts on her running shoes
1552233132111221.content:
18 thought it over for a minute before a particularly nasty idea came to mind. She looked down at her friend's sock-clad foot and Cheshire cat smile appeared on her face. "How about you and me go for a little walk around the house."

Bulma looked surprised at her friend's suggestion and thought about if it would actually be okay to do so. Vegeta might be a jerk but did her really deserved to be stepped on like some kind of bug? Would he even be okay id she did?

Thinking it over she thought back to how rude he'd been to her and all the battles he'd been in where he'd been punched, kicked, blasted, and thrown in to the side of mountains. Compared to all that, what did stepping on him amount to?

"Alright..." Bulma grinned. "Let's take a walk."

18 looked pleased at the teal-haired woman's response and gestured to the door. "After you."

The Capsule Corp. heiress nodded nervously and cautiously began to place her foot on the ground. Vegeta had been struggling the entire time and the second his back met the floor his struggles seemed to intensify. She paused... it was now or never.

She took her first step forward, all her weight baring down on the tiny Saiyan. Much to her relief and surprise, he didn't pop. In fact he pressed into her sole and remained fully intact.

With this newfound revelation she took another step, and another, and another, until finally she had a natural rhythm going. Bulma was walking to the door with her husband underfoot like it was just another day at the office.

"So how's he feel?" 18 asked.

"Like a rock in a shoe, but not bad." Bulma answered.

Meanwhile in the sock, the prince of all Saiyan's cried out in pain from the full weight off his wife's body. Was she walking right now? She must be? Why else would he feel weightless, the heavy and crushed. She was walking right now and using him as an insole.

That... That... Witch!

Had he not been a Saiyan this would've killed him. He knows she knows that and it only served to anger him even more. This woman was insane! Not only would he make them suffer when he got out of this, but he was going to get a divorce while he was at it!

Nothing was worth having to endure this!

Nothing!

Again Vegeta felt the weight of the world press against his body and he felt as if he would pop. He was literally being sandwiched between floor and flesh.

He needed to find a way out of all this!
1552233132111221.title: Let's take a walk

15522331321113.content:
Bulma smiled contently at her husband as he tried his best to massage her foot. Unlike with18 however, his version of a relaxing massage amounted to a rapid series of punches and kicks to her delicate sole.

Surprisingly enough though, it actually felt quite nice. The feeling reminded her of the time she went to the spa and got to experience their foot soaker that had those little fish that nibbled at her toes.

It wasn't exactly the same as Vegeta wasn't eating away at anything that stuck to her feet, but the ticklish and relaxing sensation nearly indistinguishable. Although she wouldn't let him know that.

No, for now she would simply smile and enjoy her husband working his feet and fists to the bone to please her.

18 watched the whole scene with a smug expression. Watching the prideful and egocentric prince reduced to massaging his weaker human wife's foot was too much fun.

Watching him get taken down a peg reminded her of the first time they met and she humbled him. She put him in his place for all to see and it was a moment in time she would always cherish.

If only she could see him humbled more often. Even still, she did wonder if Bulma really would unshrink him after this.

The massage went on for another half hour before Vegeta started to lose steam. Try as he may his punches and kicks began to lose strength and he could feel his muscles aching for a rest.

This was odd to the prince. He was a Saiyan and that meant he should have stamina for days on end. Hoe could he already be out of energy? Was this a side effect of his wife's little experiment?

Bulma noticed this too and her smile only widened. It would seem Vegeta was losing power and that meant her pills were now firing on all calendars. "What's wrong honey? Getting tired?"

18 had to suppress a giggle when she caught Vegeta gasp. The little Saiyan looked up to his wife in surprise before the realization set in. "You knew this would happen this would happen, didn't you?"

"Maybe." she teased.

"Curse you, woman! It was bad enough being shrunk, but now you would rob me of my strength as well!?" Vegeta raged.

Bulma was unfazed by his cries of rage and instead leaned in close. "Oh don't be such a grumpy Gus. Yes my pills did drain some of your power as per their function. These were made to combat Beerus and Whis after all."

Vegeta growled. He'd had enough of this. "Whatever! I did as you asked now unshrink me at once!"

"Fine. Fine." Bulma waved off. She then proceeded to scoop up her husband before he had time to react. He struggled in her grasp, letting out a stream of curses that would make a sailor blush.

"What a baby." 18 whispered, her smile still present.

"C'mon 18, follow me." Bulma waved as the two left the room.

"So we headed to the lab to fix the prince?" the android asked.

"We are, but Vegeta isn't." Bulma answered as she entered an all to familiar room.

Vegeta was about ready to blow his stack again when he noticed the room he'd just entered. Pink walls, family portraits, a training poster! "This is Bulla's room!"

"Tha't right." Bulma grinned.

"Why would you bring me here woman!?" Vegeta questioned hotly.

"Simple. I need some time to put the antidote together and I can't bring you into the lab at your size. So You're going to spend some time with your daughter until 18 and I come back with the cure."

"What!?" Vegeta exclaimed.

"Don't be like that, a little father daughter time won't kill you."
15522331321113.title: New Guardian

choices: 18 and Bulma torture Vegeta with their armpits
Bulma and 18 mess with Vegeta with their mouths
Yamcha shows up for some reason
1552233132113.content:
Vegeta began to grow nervous under the android's cool gaze, how she could be so threatening while looking so calm was unnerving. Even Frieza for all his false niceties and bravado expressed his anger or annoyance when provoked. 18 on the other hand just stared you down with emotionless eyes.

The prince tried his best to regain his composure. "So what if I was!? This is something more befitting his station, a prince like myself shouldn't bother with a peasant such as yourself!"

Bulma actually looked a bit stunned at her husband's boldness. Honestly she shouldn't have been surprised given who Vegeta was and what his honor and pride as a warrior and prince meant to him. But there was a difference between being prideful and being stupid.

It would seem the prince of all Saiyans leaned more towards stupid.

18's eyes narrowed. "Really now? If I'm a peasant then you're even less than that."

"What!?" Vegeta growled.

"I didn't stutter. You're the one who's tiny and insignificant here, and you're massaging my feet to boot. Right now you're less than me, a peasant. Hmm? Come to think of it, you're less than a servant. You're a bug who just so happens to be born with a big mouth and overinflated ego."

Vegeta felt his fists clench. "Say. That. Again."

The blonde smirked smugly. "You're. A. Bug."

"RAHHHH!!!" Vegeta roared. Faster than Bulma could blink, the miniature Saiyan began to charge at the android's exposed foot. He began to pound away at the soft flesh like a sandbag. He raged at the top of his lungs, his blows becoming more and more ferocious and sloppy as he screamed.

Unfortunately for the small Saiyan his tantrum had little to no effect on the aggravated cyborg. If anything he was only annoying her further with his childish resistance.

Bulma took not of this too and sighed at her husband's childishness. She had to put a stop to this before he embarrassed himself and her by extension, any further. She walked over to the distracted prince and watched with growing annoyance as he failed to notice her approach, too preoccupied with trying to inflict pain on her hired guest.

"Sorry about this." Bulma said to 18 before bringing her foot down on the prince.

Vegeta again felt the weight of the world on his back as the full weight of one of the giants fell upon him. He gaged and coughed and turned his head to see his wife glaring at him with her hands on her hips. A sign he knew meant he'd gotten on her bad side.

"Damn you." he groaned.

She then turned to 18. "Again, sorry about that."

"Better you step on him than me." 18 shrugged. "Still, it was nice while it lasted."

"True, you looked like you were really enjoying yourself."

"I was." the blonde sighed.

Bulma felt bad for one of her few female friends. Stupid Vegeta, why couldn't he just play along? He just had to ruin things like always. She needed to make this up to 18 somehow.

"Hey, 18?"

"Hmm?"

Bulma grinned. "How's about we punish him together for his bad behavior?"

18 thought about it for a moment before nodding. "Alright, what do you have in mind?"

"I was thinking..."
1552233132113.title: Vegeta Snaps

choices: Both women torture Vegeta at the same time
15522331321131.content:
"Are you serious?" 18 asked, slightly taken aback by her friend's perverse suggestion.

"Mmhmm!" she nodded. "It'll be fun, plus I don't think Vegeta will like it very much."

The android thought it over for a moment as she turned her attention from her employer to her insignificant other. While the idea she suggested was a bit out there, there was no question the little prince wouldn't like it. After all a prideful man such as himself could never accept being manhandled by someone he perceived to be lower than him.

"Alright, I'll give it a shot." the blonde agreed. "But if things get too weird I'm done."

Bulma smiled, "You got it." she then removed her foot from her husbands back before scooping him up by his leg."

"Woman!? I demand you release me!" Vegeta struggled, completely unaware of the sight behind him. Had he paid more attention he would've freaked at the sight of 18 partially rolling up her shirt.

"I can't believe I agreed to this." she mumbled under her breath, but despite her reservations she would at least try it. "Ready when you are."

Bulma smirked as she turned her husband the androids way. His jaw nearly dropped at the sight of her partially rolled up shirt, revealing part of her black bra and bare arm. "What in the seven hells are you doing!? Put your shirt back on!"

18 was tempted to oblige, but the sight of his discomfort kept her from doing so. Not even a minute in and already he was freaking out.

"What's wrong, Vegeta? Don't like what you see?" Bulma teased.

"What are you on about!? Of course I don't like what I see!"

18 felt offended.

"Then you're really not going to like what we have planned." the bluenette giggled.

Vegeta didn't like the sound of that giggle, or the sight of the android's narrowed eyes. "Elaborate."

Bulma was loving this. "Oh we can show you better than we can tell you."
15522331321131.title: A Perverse Punishment

choices: Future Trunks comes over for a visit
155223313211311.content:
"18?" Bulma sung. The android rolled her eyes at the blue-haired woman's theatrics, but never the less complied with her request. She raised her exposed arm up and gave the couple of a good view of her cleanly shaven pit.

Vegeta's eyes widened at the sight as he put two and two together, while his wife could only whistle in awe. 18 took way better care of herself then she thought. She briefly thought about her own pits and then sighed. As clean as she was, 18 was on a whole other level.

"Are we doing this or not?" 18 asked, taking note of her friend's brief pause.

"Y-yeah." she quickly recovered. "Let's get this party started. Ready Vegeta?"

"Hell no! I demand you stop this nonsense immediately!" he roared. As usual his words fell on def ears as his wife began to approach the patient blonde. "Woman!? Did you not hear what I just said!? Stop this at once!"

The Saiyan prince felt his blood run cold as he drew ever closer to the bare bit and got a good whiff of deodorant. His wife was going to stick him there. No! No! No!

Vegeta tried to struggle, but at his angle he couldn't get any leverage to free himself. "Release me!"

"You sure that's what you want?" Bulma asked.

"Yes!!!" Vegeta shouted.

18 sighed. Vegeta was an idiot.

Bulma winked. "If that's what you want."

Before Vegeta knew what hit him, he was flung into the bare pit of the android. 18 flinched from the contact and Vegeta himself stuck to her like a spider to a wall.

"Quick, put your arm down!" Bulma smiled. 18 did just that.

She shuddered when felt the Saiyan begin to struggle. This felt weird. Not unpleasant, but weird.

"This feels weird." 18 commented.

"Just give it a chance," Bulma shrugged. "Besides, you haven't even done anything yet."

That was true.
155223313211311.title: 18 tortures Vegeta first

choices: Both women suddenly begin to shrink
1552233132113111.content:
"Well? What are you waiting for? Grind him up." Bulma urged.

18 herself didn't know what to make of her friend's bold request. It already felt weird enough having the shrunken Saiyan trapped within the confines of her armpit, but to actually try and grind him up?

This was beginning to get too strange for her. She would've protested against this, but that stupid look of enthusiasm on her friend's face made her hold her tongue. Sometimes she was just too nice for her own good.

The blonde sighed. "Fine."

She took a moment to try and get used to the strange sensation tickling her pit, and slowly began to grind her arm. This caused the little prince to start struggling something fierce. Before his struggles felt like an odd ticklish sensation, now they felt like the struggles of a desperate man.

The more she grinded her arm back and forth, the more Vegeta seemed to try and fight back. 18 kept this to herself of course as she didn't want to ruin Bulma's fun, plus she was paying her to do this.

"Well don't keep me in suspense! How's he feel!" the inventor asked.

18 thought about what she should say. On the one hand the feeling while strange wasn't unpleasant. But if Bulma knew that then she'd probably urge her to continue.

Or... she could lie and say this was no good. If she lied then she could finally be done with this. But would that affect her paycheck in any way if the Capsule Corp. woman found out?

Probably not...
1552233132113111.title: Pit of despair

choices: Vegeta manages to get out of the way
155223313212.content:
"D-damn you!" Vegeta seethed. "Damn you you obsolete piece of junk!"

The pressure increased further. "What was that? I must have misheard you."

Common sense said the prince should keep his mouth shut, but then again, Vegeta wasn't really known to follow common sense. "I said you're an obsolete piece of junk!"

The pressure worsened. "So I you did. Anything else you want to get off your chest?"

Bulma looked worried. Despite being a Saiyan warrior and generally unpleasant at times, she didn't really want her husband to get hurt too badly. "18, maybe..."

"Y-your junk! Obsolete! Yesterdays model! A piece of scarp!" Vegeta shouted. He then turned his attention to his wife. "And you..."

"Me." Bulma pointed to herself dumbly.

"Yes you, woman! You saggy chested airhead, you're just as bad!" he ranted.

Silence filled the room as Bulma's eyes bulged at Vegeta's tirade. Even 18 looked stunned that the prince would be so bold to insult the one person that could get him out of this mess.

Bad move on his part.

18 was just about to apply more pressure when she felt a hand on her shoulder. Followed it back to Bulma who had a bizarre cross between sadistic joy and anger on her face.

"Tag out." she said as she tagged 18's hand.

The android nodded. "Alright. Tag out."

She removed her foot from Vegeta's back and for a moment felt nothing but sweet relief. That 18 woman was far too heavy, she really needed to go on a diet.

He was about to comment on this when he noticed another shadow overtake him. He propped himself up on his elbows and noticed his wife staring at him with that strange look. "So honey... what was that you said about my boobs?"

A certain anger began to well up inside the prince. He needed to let it all out. "I said you're saggy, your own mother has a more perky chest than you!"

Something in Bulma snapped!

18 was the one looking worried now.

"Really." Bulma asked, her tone not matching her face. "Well then it's a good thing my chest isn't my only asset. I also have a well rounded butt. Here, why don't you take a closer look!"

Vegeta's eyes widened when his wife spun on her heel to give him a good view of her backside. He was very familiar with that ass. So much so that he began to crawl away slowly. Big ass plus tiny body spelled disaster.
155223313212.title: Bulma wants to sit on Vegeta

choices: Bulma begins to grind Vegeta up
1552233132121.content:
Vegeta tried to crawl away, but his earlier torture at the hands of the android had limited his mobility. He was far too sore to make any kind of daring escape. All he could do was stare up at his impeding doom.

Bulma, far too lost in her rage and vanity was all too happy to remind her husband who was in charge in this household. She gave her but tux a shake before slowly falling back.

For Vegeta it was as if the world was suddenly moving in slow motion. In this state of delayed time he could see the shadow he was trapped in slowly expanding in all directions.

He could see the actual look of concern breaking through mask of the bald one's wife. And more than that, he could see the twin meteorites his wife called an ass falling down upon him.

Fear began to grip the Saiyan prince's chest at the realization of what his wife's ass would do to him. The androids foot was bad, but at least she could limit the pressure and control it.

Bulma on the other hand was falling and gaining speed. The momentum alone would pulverize him. The full weight of his wife was going to fall on him without a means of slowing down her descent.

"Get ready hubby because here I come!" Bulma teased/threatened. She was going to teach the arrogant and ungrateful jerk a lesson about insulting her painstakingly maintained beauty. "BULMA BOMB!!!"

"AHHH!!!"

That was Vegeta's last word before time resumed. The teal-haired heiress of the Capsule Corporation's ass fell... and the shrunken Saiyan disappeared beneath her ample rump.

18 hear the slam and visibly winced for the shrunken jerk. Bulma herself however just winced in pain. Her ass may have been plump but it sure as hell wasn't a good impact cushion.

"Ow." she groaned.

"Yeah..." 18 began. "Ow."
1552233132121.title: Weight of the world

choices: Master Roshi stops by for a visit
15522331321211.content:
The pain Vegeta was in now was damn near indescribable. Sure pain was nothing new given he'd grown up with it ever since he was a child, but it wasn't too often he found himself literally buried under the weight of the world.

Gods above had his wife always been so heavy? The answer was no, and the prince counted his blessing that she couldn't read his thoughts right now otherwise this could become a whole lot worse.

The tiny prince tried to ignore the pain, to push it to the back of his mind and put all his focus into trying to escape. He tried to struggle, but the weight was simply too much for him.

Bulma was far too heavy for his diminished body and after his little comments about her ''assets'', there was a very high chance she wouldn't be in a rush to move.

"Damn that woman and her mad science." Vegeta growled. He hated this and at the moment he hated her. She had better pray he suffocated down here.

Meanwhile up above, the two women wondered what had become of the prince, They knew he couldn't be dead as Saiyans were as tough as they come. So that just left the question of where to go from here.

The two brainstormed a few ideas until finally a particularly sadistic one came to Bulma. "Hey 18?"

"Yeah?" the blonde answered with a raised eyebrow.

"Pull my finger." she teased.

The android looked mildly annoyed at the childish comment but never the less complied. She pulled the blue-haired woman's extended index and what followed was one of the loudest bursts the android had ever heard.

"Nice." 18 said sarcastically whist wafting away the smell.

"Oh come on." Bulma giggled. "You can't tell me you aren't curios about Vegeta right now."

No, 18 really couldn't.

Another burst of wind. Bulma groaned. "Okay, that time it wasn't on purpose."

Down below the tiny Saiyan clutched his throat for dear life. Never before had he smelled something so vile. It was worse than a mountain of corpses left out in the sun.

He was so puny now that simple farts were like gigaton bombs. The smell surrounded him on all sides and the air pressure forced him further into the ground.

This was awful. This was hell. No, scratch that, at least in hell he could move around. This was far worse. "Damn you."

His tirade would've continued but another shot of foul air entered his space. He was going to die down here if this woman didn't move. He gaged again on the horrid air.

He didn't want to die like this.,.
15522331321211.title: Gas Chamber

choices: Trunks feels something's off and bursts in
155223313213.content:
*Knock!*

*Knock!*

*Knock!*

"Hey mom!? You in there!?" A voice called from the hall. Both women froze as they knew the owner of that voice was none other than Trunks.

"Crap!" Bulma whispered panicked. "I'm in here sweetie, just... don't open the door!"

She then gestured to 18 who thankfully seemed to get the message and nodded.

"Why?" was the young half Saiyan's reply.

"Uh... I'm... not decent!" Bulma quickly blurted out. "Yeah that's it I'm... totally naked right now!"

18 gave the teal haired woman an unreadable look.

"What do you want from me? It's he first thing that came to mind." she whispered.

"Ew, gross! Too much information!" Trunks nearly gagged.

Vegeta in the meantime was unable to free himself from the android's grip as she swiftly scooped him up off the floor. He needed to somehow break free and alert his son to his predicament. He hated relying on others like this, but he was desperate. "Trunks!" he shouted. "Get in here boy!"

Both women's eyes shot wide open as the prince shouted for his son.

"Huh!? Is dad in there too?" Trunks asked. "He's not... naked too is he?"

"Uh..." Bulma was at a loss. She didn't expect Vegeta of all people to call out for help. "Hide him fast."

18 sighed. "Right."
155223313213.title: The fun is interrupted

choices: 18 leaves Vegeta in her boot for a while
Bulma plant's Vegeta in someone's breakfast
1552233132131.content:
18 quickly scanned around the room for anywhere she could hide the prince. Under the bed was no good, he'd just run out into the open and shout for help. She still couldn't believe he actually did that though. Maybe he has matured somewhat?

She then spotted the drawers, but then again he was still strong from what Bulma told her and could punch his way out. If he did the whole charade was over. She could always just... no! She shook her head. That's way to perverse! Damn Roshi.

Damn it all! Just where was she supposed to hide Vegeta that didn't involve him smashing something or running out into the open!? 'Think 18! Where can you hide a stubborn little prince!?"

That's when she spotted them. The answer to all her prayers. Her boots. No one would think to look in those and even if she had to let Vegeta go from her grasp, she could pin him down with her foot. It was perfect.

Bulma followed her friend's gaze as did Vegeta and when he spotted what she'd been eying his cheeks turned a sickly shade of green. "You'd better not--"

"Be quiet." 18 ordered as she marched over to her discarded footwear. As she did Vegeta began to struggle like never before, this would be the ultimate humiliation.

"No! No! Don't you dare! Trunks! Get in here now!" Vegeta barked. He could see the inside of them now, and smell the stale air that awaited him down below.

"Okay." Trunks said from the other side.

"Drop him now!" Bulma frantically whispered as she could hear the doorknob turning.

18 didn't need to be told twice as she dropped the prince into the deep dark hell below. He screamed on the way down until he landed with a wet splat into the sole of the boot.

He immediately began to gag at the smell and taste that invaded his mouth. He hadn't tasted anything this vile since he was a child and Zarbon was on kitchen duty.

The horror...

Unfortunately for Vegeta the nightmare wasn't over yet as the light above him soon went out as he saw the blonde robot woman's foot entering the void.

"Son of a--"

18 quickly stuck her boots on as Trunks finally opened the door. He looked around the room but didn't see heads or tails of his father, just his mother and Krillin's wife. "Hey."

"Hey." she answered back.

The boy then turned his attention to his mother. "Sooo… are you gonna make breakfast?"

Bulma gasped. She was so excited about her plans that she completely forgot about her children. "Sorry about that. You go get Bulla and I'll fix us up something nice. How does that sound."

"Awesome." Trunks smiled before darting out of the room.

Bulma sighed. "Care to join us fr breakfast 18?"

The blonde shrugged. She wasn't going to pass up free food. "Sure."

"Great!" Bulma clapped as the two left the room. "So how does Vegeta feel in there?"

18 grinned. "Like a cushion."

Vegeta meanwhile growled against the heat, pressure, and darkness. "T-They'll pay for this!"
.
1552233132131.title: Boot Time

choices: Vegeta has to tough it out a little while longer
Vegeta gets a mental call from King Kai
Bulma wants Vegeta in her boots now
15522331321311.content:
"T-They'll pay for this!" Vegeta growled.

He didn't know how long he'd be trapped in this android's boot, but he knew for certain he wasn't going to stay in it. He needed to find someway to escape and get that woman to unshrink him immediately. This little experiment of hers had gone on long enough.

The tiny Saiyan tried to struggle free, but was alas to match for the sheer weight of 18's foot. Not to mention the constant rise and fall he was experiencing didn't much help matters. Every time he tried to put his strength to good use he was met with a sense of weightlessness before being forced down painfully into the moist sole of the boot.

It was yet another horrible experience and Vegeta felt as if his bones would snap. The weight was simply too much, like that time he fought that giant demon that stepped on his house.

Then there was that smell. The vile stench of boot feet. It burned his nostrils and made his eyes water. The odor only grew stronger as the time passed and he knew that it wouldn't let up soon. It's origin was the foot itself and the boot's sole. It wanted nothing more that sink into his skin and claim him for it's own. It was almost as if it was alive.

The sweat is what gave rise to this foul smell and it was threatening to claim him as well. The salty water was already bathing him from above and below and had even entered his mouth once. He couldn't spit it out soon enough. This was a far more disgusting place then he could have ever imagined.

"Damn them both." Vegeta groaned. "I will not perish this way!"

Unfortunately for the little prince no one was listening to his declarations. No one could even hear him from his stinky little prison. No one outside of the two giants even knew of his ordeal. He was well and truly alone to face this immeasurable trial. If only there was a way to free himself...
15522331321311.title: Toughing it out

155223313213111.content:
"So, you wanna tell me the real reason why you used your husband as a guinea pig for your little experiment?" 18 asked. Although she would never outwardly state it, she was curios.

Bulma thought it over as she finished washing the remaining dishes from breakfast. "I guess I can tell you. The pills I slipped into Vegeta's food were meant for Beerus and Whis if they ever decided to just destroy the earth and Goku and Vegeta aren't a match for them."

"I see." 18 replied, her foot now tapping the ground where she sat. "That's actually pretty sneaky of you. You know they'd never turn down a free meal and they'd never suspect you of trying to drug them."

"Exactly! The day would be saved and all thanks to yours truly." Bulma nodded to herself. Sometimes her own genius even surprised herself.

The android looked amused. "That's all well and good, but that still doesn't explain why you used it on Vegeta."

"Pardon?" Bulma asked.

"Hmph. You could have used literally anyone for this and yet you chose Vegeta, why?"

Bulma was smiling nervously now. "Well, I guess I also wanted to just have some fun with him. He's either always grouchy or focused solely on training, so we don't get to spend much time together. Plus I thought the shift in perspective would make me a lot more authoritative."

18 raised an eyebrow. "You do know this is Vegeta you're talking about here, right? He would sooner die than bend over and let someone order him around."

"Yeah." Bulma agreed. "But at least there'll be a silver lining for him when all this is over."

"And what pray tell would that be?"

The inventor smiled. "If he can endure everything that's about to happen, he'll be a hell of a lot stronger when I give him the antidote."

"Antidote?"

------

Vegeta felt his world shake, rattle, and roll as 18 continuously stomped her foot. It was like when she started walking just a lot faster and more painful. Gods he didn't want to know what would happen if she started running.

So far all his ideas of escape came up short as he went over the constant scenarios in his head. He couldn't over power the android, he couldn't wiggle free, and he couldn't call out for help lest he earn himself a mouth full of sweat.

Damn it! If he made it out of this alive he was going to wring the robot's dainty little neck and chew out the stupid monk for not having a better handle on his woman.

That stray thought gave the prince some comfort, however that comfort soon turned to agony as her foot pressed him painfully into the sole. Did she know her husband crossed his mind?

How did she always know?

------

Back on the outside 18 furiously pressed hard against the sole of her boot as Bulma took a seat at the table across from her. "He still putting up a fight?"

18 didn't look her way. "Yeah. He seriously doesn't know when to quit."

"No, he really doesn't." Bulma smiled. "So... when are you gonna let him out?"

"When his will breaks." answered the blonde.

"Ha! If that's the case then he's gonna be in there a while."

18 glared at her boot. "Probably. Did you need him back right now?"

"Nope." was Bulma simple reply. "Why? You got an idea?"

Now it was 18's turn to smile. "I might."
155223313213111.title: Stay strong Vegeta!

1552233132131111.content:
"What do you have in mind?" Bulma asked as she and 18 began walking around the house.

"I was thinking about maybe getting some training done." the android smirked while looking down at her boot.

The teal haired woman couldn't help but giggle. "It has been a while since you've thrown a kick, hasn't it?"

"Too long. Retirement isn't all it's cracked up to be." the blonde answered before the pair walked out the front door. "It'll be nice to get back into the swing of things, especially since I have someone to help me."

"Careful." Bulma giggled. "Krillin might get jealous if he found out you and Vegeta went to go train without him."

"Krillin's a big boy, he'll be just fine. Although, I do wonder how he'd react to seeing Vegeta so tiny." 18 pondered.

Now Bulma was smirking. "Knowing him he'd probably have a good laugh before getting up on his high horse."

"Sounds about right." 18 agreed. "So, what's a good spot to train around here?"

Bulma thought it over for a moment. "Well, the gravity rooms currently out of commission... but we still have that gym wing installed that Vegeta never touched. Oh! And we also recently put in a sparring arena."

The android hummed as she began grinding her foot into the grass. Bulma and her family was loaded and her husband was a fightaholic, so it made sense they had the funds and means to afford his expensive lifestyle. The only question was witch rout should she take?

She could go to the gym and work up a good sweat, or she could give that sparring arena a go.

Then again... if none of those things interested her then she was sure she could create her own fun.

What to do? What to do?
1552233132131111.title: Training

15522331321311111.content:
"I think I'll try out that gym you mentioned." 18 mused. There weren't that many in the city and she'd pretty much been banned from every last one due to her ridiculous strength. Hopefully the equipment at Capsule Corp. would be made of sterner stuff.

Bulma seemed pleased by her answer, at least someone would be using the gym and not letting her family's hard earned money and effort go to waste. "Excellent choice! Just follow me and I'll direct you there."

The blonde nodded and the pair began there quest. "So what machines do you have at this gym of yours?"

"Tons! We have exercise bikes, treadmills, Boflex, ProForms, etc. We even have the standard stuff like, weights, pull-up bars, sandbags, and many more."

18 was genuinely impressed. "Wow, your family really went all out on this one, though I suppose I shouldn't be surprised. Nothing but the best for the prince, right?"

She finished this statement by stamping her foot.

Bulma giggled. "Yeah, it's just a shame he never used it. Personally I think he's just in love with the gravity room. Either that or training... or both."

"I think the two go hand in hand."18 teased.

"Yeah, maybe." the inventor agreed. "Anyway, we're here."

The pair paused in front of the large one story structure. While Bulma looked elated, 18 looked anything but. This bulding was just so... plain. She really didn't know what to expect, but certainly not something like this.

"Oh? Why the blank stare." Bumla asked.

"It's just so... plain looking." 18 answered.

"Oh I see. Just because I come from money you thought it would look nicer. Well save your opinion for the end and have a look inside."

18 did just that and once she entered the building she froze. It looked so much bigger on the inside instead of the outside. All the equipment was lined up so neat and... was that a pool!?

"Still think it's bland now?" Bulma smirked smugly.

18 didn't respond. Bulma took that as a victory.

"Well? What are you waiting for? Pick something!"
15522331321311111.title: 18 Hits the Gym

choices: The bike can't handle 18's strength and breaks down
Chi-Chi barges in looking for Vegeta
155223313213111111.content:
18 gave the area a quick scan, wondering just what she should try first. The weights all looked good, but given her already monstrous strength, those dumbbells probably wouldn't do much for her. Same for some of the other machines,

The pool looked good, but taking a dive in there meant changing clothes and releasing Vegeta, something she wasn't too keen on doing anytime soon. "Hmm?"

The android continued to look things over while Bulma began to look a tad bit nervous. Did 18 not like any of the options available after all?

The worries were soon laid to rest when the icy blue eyes of the android settled on silver painted exercise bike. It was so simple and basic yet for some reason she just couldn't take her eyes off it. Even Bulma was surprised.

18 walked over to the machine while her eyes seemed to search for something. As a child she never really got the chance to ride a bike. She'd driven motorcycles and cars, but never a basic bicycle. With that thought in mind she hopped on the machine. This was probably as close as she was going to get.

"I see the exercise bike caught your attention, huh? I'm honestly a little surprised." Bulma smiled.

"I never got the chance to ride a normal bike before, so this is an all new experience for me." the blonde explained,

Bulma frowned hearing that. She 18's childhood all sunshine and rainbows given that whole incident with Dr. Gero. "Well feel free to enjoy this bike all you like. I bet Vegeta's going to be so mad now."

18 knew what the teal-haired woman was trying to do and appreciated her attempt to take her mind off things. "Thanks, and you're right, Vegeta's about to have a real bad time."

"Yeah. Let me just help you get started." Bulma pressed a few buttons on the bike and a screen lit up with the numbers 0.0 displayed in bold. "Whenever your ready."

18 smirked and nodded.
155223313213111111.title: Exercise Bike

choices: Bulma's dad is looking for Vegeta
1552233132131111111.content:
At first she started off slow, steadily growing accustomed to the size and feel of the bike. Vegeta at his normal size wasn't that far away from her in scale, so it only made sense the machine felt just right for her.

It made her wonder if this was what a normal bike would be like, sans the whole staying stationary thing. Would she even be any good at it, or would she fall over like most beginners did?

She wouldn't really know as she wouldn't be caught dead using training wheels or even a normal bike now as she could fly. That and there was no way she'd damage reputation by giving the others a juicy story to tell.

No, she was content to enjoy this simulated feeling of what it was like to ride a bike. Sure there was no wind rushing through her hair or a road to follow, but it was nice all the same.

Bulma meanwhile couldn't help but smile when she saw 18 genuinely enjoying herself. It was easy to forget that because of the good doctor she and her sibling missed out on a lot of things.

Things like riding a bike. It was such a simple pleasure that many took for granted. She could still remember the first time she got on a bike herself. She fell and scuffed her knee.

She wanted to quit right after that but surprisingly it was her mother that encouraged her to keep on trying. Eventually she got it right and it became something of a hobby over time.

It was a good memory, and now she was kind of building a similar one here with her friend. "So how do you like it?"

"This is actually pretty good." 18 answered. She was now beginning to pick up speed. "I just wish I had tried something like this earlier."

"Well feel free to use this bike whenever you like." Bulma smiled. "Just make sure you let me know ahead of time."

"Will do." the android smiled back. She was really starting to pick up the pace now.

The blue-haired woman's eyes fell to the bike petals as 18 began to pick up speed. Just looking at the constant cycle motion made her think about her husband. "So how do you think Vegeta's doing down there?"

18 rolled her eyes. "He's a Saiyan elite, I'm sure he'll be fine."

"Probably, after all he did survive in the ring against people way stronger than him."

If only the pair knew the true hell the blonde was putting the tiny Saiyan through. Vegeta himself felt sick, dizzy, his entire world shaking, rattling, and rolling like clothes in a washing machine.

The weight against his back was in a constant pf flux. Every few seconds it would feel heavy, then light, then heavy again. There was no consistency or pattern to follow to help him escape.

Then there was the speed and tumbling he was doing. He didn't have any kind of motion sickness as far as he knew, but this was really starting to get to him.

And lastly there were the worst elements. The sweat and smell that came along with it. Since this robot freak stuffed him down here he'd been subjected to all kinds of discomforts, and this was by far the worst.

The sweat was beginning to seep into the sole of the boot, mixing in with the already dried up remnants. It felt horrendous when it touched him. It was foul and sticky. It marinated him and made sure he wouldn't forget where he was.

He was under 18's heel and would remain there until the giants deemed him a free Saiyan.

The prince wanted to scream, but fear of downing the vile liquid made him steel his tongue. When he escaped this rancid prison he wouldn't just chew out his wife. He'd make her and her henchwoman pay dearly.

It was this thought that kept him sane.

He would make them pay...

155223313213112.title: Vegeta gets a mental call from King Kai

choices: Bulma wants to have family time
Trunks demands Bulma fix his dad
15522331322.content:
"Hmm? Oh, I got it! Let's show him off to Trunks!" Bulma cheered.

18's expression remained blank for a moment before breaking out into a grin. "Sounds good to me." she then looked down to the floor where Vegeta was being crushed. "Ya hear that, we're taking you to see your son."

The prince groaned in discomfort, but felt a slight sense of relief. They were taking him to see Trunks. What fools. There was no way his son would sit idly by and let these two continue with what they were doing.

He hated having to rely on someone else for assistance. but if it got him out of this jam then he guessed he could deal with it. "Fools." he whispered as he felt the pressure on his back lessen.

The prince of all Saiyans allowed himself to be plucked from the ground by the blonde machine while his wife looked on in excitement. "This'll be so much fun."

"Here ya go." 18 said as she passed the prince along.

Bulma nearly squealed when she held her tiny husband. "Let's go find Trunks."

18 nodded while Vegeta hid a smirk.

It didn't take them long to find the little half Saiyan either as he was in the kitchen with a bowl of cereal in hand. He looked tired like he hadn't slept a wink. Perhaps Bulla kept him up all night again?

"You ready for this?" Bulma asked Vegeta as he grumbled. "How about you 18?"

"Ready as I'll ever be." she answered.

"Okay. Hey Trunks?" Bulma called as she and 18 entered the kitchen.

The half breed blinked once before as dressing the two. "Hey mom, Mrs. 18. What's up?"

The teal haired woman held out her hand. "Check this out."

'Moment of truth time.' 18 thought.

Trunks blinked again. "Dad!? What!?"

His mind had to be playing tricks on him, his dad was big and strong, not so... puny.

Vegeta began to grow agitated at his son's surprised gaze. "Enough gawking already! Tell this woman to fix me!"
15522331322.title: Show em' off

choices: Bulma heads to the kitchen to make breakfast
Bulma heads to the lab to test more pills on Vegeta
Goku suddenly pops in for a visit
1552233133.content:
Bulma smirked before walking over and plucking the shrunken Saiyan from the floor by his heel, ignoring the stream of curses that left his lips. Needless to say the prince of all saiyans was not pleased.

His darling wife then had the nerve to dangle him in front of the blonde android woman like a caught rat. Though she didn't give to much away, the slight widening of her eyes spoke volumes of her surprise.

"What I need from you 18 is stand by my side so Vegeta doesn't do anything rash... or crazy." she blue teal haired woman explained.

"So essentially what you want is an enforcer." 18 inquired. That didn't sound too bad.

"Yep." Bulma smiled. Vegeta and I are finally gonna spend some quality time together without training to get in the way. Plus this little experiment will do wonders for working out the all kinks in the final version.

"Unhand me woman! I demand you unshrink me at once!" Vegeta shouted.

"Ignore him." Bulma brushed off.

"He said something." 18 smirked smugly. Well at least this job wouldn't be boring.

Vegta growled in frustration. He didn't like any of this, nor the fact that that blonde tin can was looking at him so smug. Flashbacks to their fight all those years ago where she broke his arms came flooding back. "What are you staring at you glorified toaster!?"

The prince's comment was rewarded by a large finger poking him not to gently in the gut. "You wanna say that again little man."

Vegeta growled as he was again poked by the blonde's finger. "Stop that!"

"Why? Can't you stop me yourself?" 18 teased.

"I hate machines." Vegeta grumbled. Eventually the prodding ceased and Bulma brought him up to her face.

"I hope your ready Vegeta because it's time to get the day rolling."

Vegeta growled.

155311.content:
“What do you mean he's not coming!”

“He said he couldn't be bothered big sis”

“What does he mean by that!!”

Currently the two universe 6 saying were on Planet Salada. Its been two months since the whole Universal Erase situation. Every since then the young Saiyan Caulifla has been training as hard as she can, with the help of Kale she's been able to get stronger. Thats when she got the brilliant idea to fight the strongest mortal in universe 6, 1 on 1. The legendary Hitman. Hit.

However there was a problem. he didn't really care.

“I cant believe he's not showing up, does he think he's better then me. Id lay him down flat!” Caulifla said storming back and forth on her own personal training field that she and Kale uses.

“He said that you wouldn't prove challenging and that he was busy” Kale said ready for her next outburst.

“Kale, you and i know that won't work. You too afraid to hit me” Caulifla said looking at Kale.

“Well, i wouldn't say scared” Kale said under her breath.

“And since That Fat Ass God won't let me go to universe 6 to Fight Goku. I’m stuck here twiddling my thumbs!”

“I wouldn't say that?” A mysterious voice said. Both saiyans turned around to see the Angel of universe 6. Vados. “Although i did chuckle at the Fat Remark”

“Vados Sama. What are you doing here?” Kale said.

“Awesome” Caulifla said as she got into position “You came to give me a fight Vados”

“Afraid Not Caulifla” Vados said disappointing Caulifla. “But i am here to help you”

“Help me, how so?” Caulifla said.

“Well, am i wrong to assume you want to be the strongest” Vados said.

“Yeah, so” Caulifla said giving her a bit of attitude that Vados didn't appreciate. However she had a fun plan to do.

“Then this will help you” Vados said as she banged the ground with her staff and a vial appeared in front of Caulifla. With some sort of Holy liquid.

Caulifla caught it as she looked at it, Kale being just as curious. “What the hell is this?”

“Drink it and you will have no mortal equal in this universe” Vados said as Caulifla got starry eyes.

“What! Really!”

“Yes it will, but be warned, once you drink it. You can never go back” Vados said ominously “Now i must get going... Champa Sama needs me right now, i swear if it wasn't for me. He wouldn't even be able to get himself up” And with that Vados tapped the ground and disappeared.

Understanding the reasonable request Cabba nodded as he began to get up, only to find himself being plucked from the ground by Caulfilas gargantuan hands, without warning he was brought up to the giantesses face who winked at him before speaking.

“It’ll see ya around little toy hihi”

Without warning Cabba found himself flying through the air as Caulifla launched him at full speed across the sky. Within seconds he had vanished from view, when he would land nobody knew. With Cabba dealt with Caulifla smirked and stepped back over to where Kale was. Kale was blushing even more than usual as Caulifla got down on one knee again with her arm resting on it as she leaned in to hear her protégés idea.

“Right Kale Cabba’s gone so tell me what you want to now Ok?”

Kale blushed an extremely bright red that should’nt have even been possible for a person as she finally plucked up the courage to tell her big sis what she wanted.

“I-I-I...I WANT TO WORSHIP YOU SIS!!!!!!!!”

There was a moment of silence as the reality of what Kale said sunk in for both of them. Caulifla was slightly taken aback as she always felt her protégé had some kind of repressed feelings for her but she never thought her feelings would go this far. But Caulifla being Caulfla loved other people being subordinate to her, and at her size she expected a fair few ammount of Worshippers, but Kale? This was a surprising, but who was she to deny her protégée her wish.

“Wow Kale you wanna worship me! Well I can’t blame you I am the biggest strongest and best looking saiyan in universe...no in the multiverse! So I guess I can let you worship me for a while.”

Kale lit up in excitement, she couldn’t believe her big sis would allow her the honour. But she was sure to take advantage and worship her big the best she could.

With the giantess Caulifla looking down at her smirking Kale prepared to worship her. What kind of worshipping?

As much fun as it was just relaxing and having herself pampered by her protege Kale, the Saiyan inside of her couldn’t just sit by and not cause any madness or mayhem. Caulifla then lifted her hand to her face and began looking in various directions before her eyes focused on a small city a few miles away.

“Oh yeah I think I see it over there. I could’ve just found it myself, Haha I forgot how big I was there for a second! Well come on Kale you can ride up here”

The citizens started to panic as they saw a humongous figure flying over the city, were they being invaded? Had a monster from some far off world found their city? Well the pay were about to her their answer.

Landing in the middle of a rather crowded and pedestrianised area Caulifla made sure to land as hard as she could causing several powerful shockwaves to shake the city! People started to scream as they saw this behemoth of a woman standing in the center of their city.

Caulifla watched the running and screaming citizens of the city panicking at just the mere sight of her, this was an absolute thrill for her as she was causing panic and confusion just from standing there, she wondered how much panic there would be once she started terrorizing them!

“Attention little bugs. My name is Caulifla and this is my protege Kale. Now you should all feel honored, you are the first city I have visited since obtaining my gigantic form. Now I want you all to go about your business as if I wasn’t here. Don’t mind big Ol me all I’m gonna do is...”

With that said Caulifla raised her hand and fired a similar small ki Blast like Kales, except when hers hit it wiped out a quarter of the city. People screamed as they were either wiped out by the blast or crushed by falling debris.

Caulifla started to laugh and feel like the most powerful being in the planet no the whole universe!

1553111112121114.content:
Caulifla's growth did not show any signs of stopping. Every second, her power increased more and more, her mere presence seeming to crush Cabba. He had to do something and fast. His first instinct was to flee. But just as he turned to run, Vegeta's face appeared in his mind, snapping him out of his panic. Yes, his master would not allow him to flee. He had to fight, no matter how dire the situation.

Cabba jumped high into the air. For a moment he hesitated as Caulifla's massive form rose before him, then he brought his fist down. It felt like hitting a stone wall when Caulifla blocked his attack. Her fingers closed around his fist, her giant hand enclosing it more and more as she grew even bigger. Her grip felt like a ton of boulders crushing his hand. He screamed in pain and before he realized it, he was tossed through the air, slamming through five rocks.

He must have lost consciousness for a few seconds. Thunderous footsteps approached and when he opened his eyes, a giant shadow blocked out the sun. Again, the thought of his master granted him the adrenaline he needed to get up. Not a moment too early as he dodged Caulifla's giant foot. A shiver ran down his spine when he realized it was almost as big as himself.

"Still going?", Caulifla's voice boomed from above. "That's good. This is so exciting. This power is amazing!"

"Let's see about that! You might be bigger, but you seem slower, too!"

Going for a counterattack, he jumped as high as he could. But instead of reaching her face, he barely reached her chest. He sent some quick punches to her belly, but her abs were like a wall of steel and he felt like he hurt himself more than her.

"Huh, did you do something?"

Her laughter echoed in his ears, making him feel ashamed, but also angry. He landed on one of her muscular legs as thick as his entire body and jumped again. This time, he reached her face. Her tomboyish grin field his field of view for a second, then he got slammed away by the back of her hand.

Caulifla laughed again. But for some reason, Cabba felt did not feel discouraged. Quite the contrary, the more the fight dragged on, the more he felt like he could win. New power surged through his veins and he started flying high up in the air. From there, he scanned the landscape. Caulifla rose up between the rocks like a small mountain, but he kept his height out of her reach.

"Thats the spirit!" Caulifla shouted. "Don't you dare stay down before I was able to enjoy all of this amazing power!"

It was a normal day at capsule Corp, or so it seems. Currently Bulma, Bulla and Trunks were away for the week leaving Vegeta by himself. And when he was by himself, he only did one thing for himself. He trained. Simply practicing his attacks. Normally Karkarot would be with him, but he was doing this alone. Right now he was trying to regulate his new Super Saiyan Form, which was not easy. He could draw it out, but he could not find a way to sustain it for too long. It chewed through his energy too fast. Super Saiyan God never did that, leading the Prince to believe he was using it wrong somehow. Regardless he kept going.

Little did he know, he was being spied on. Not my the briefs, not by the Pilof Gang, but by two certain Saiyan’s from Universe Six

Right now, Caulifla and Kale were peeking around the corner, spotting him as Caulifla smiled.

“This is gonna work, we just need to talk to Vegeta and he will help us, just like he did Cabba” Caulifla said as the confident of the two.

“Uh... Big sis? What if he doesn’t want to help?” Kale said timidly.

“Then we will make him help!”

The girls went through a lot to make this happen. After the Tournament of Power, they fund themselves the strongest on Planet Sadala, but that was the problem. They were strongest and they didn’t know how to get stronger. They tried to go to Hit, but he didn’t care. They tried going to Chiampa, but he didn’t care.
 Eventually they decided to go to Universe 7. Get Goku to train them. However Vados quickly squashed that idea by telling them that Goku... is not the best teacher. Especially in a situation like this. Where both of the want to Reach Super Saiyan God. Hence is why Vegeta was suggested and hence is why they are here.

Vados has opened a portal for them, from their home to Universe 7. They just need to get Vegeta in. Get him to help them go Super Saiyan God.

“So... how are we doing this?” Kale asked

Caulifla smirked as she walked out in the open “Oi! Prince down here!” She shouted as loud as she can. Getting Vegeta’s attention. He watched as two saiyan girls came into view. Frowning very much at this. So he went back to his training.

“Wha... The bastard’s ignoring us!” She shouted as Caulifla flew up there. Kale behind her “Oi! I was talking to you!”

Vegeta stopped and glared at them, causing Kale to hide behind her Big Sis. “What do you two want, can’t you see i’m busy”

“Well we’re busy right now too” Caulifla said with her hands on her hips “We’re looking for a teacher to help us go to Super Saiyan God. And lucky you, it’s you. Come back to Sadala with us and make us better”

The smirk she had irritated Vegeta, and the disrespect made it even worse. Sure he would like to see Sadala, but he was busy “No. Go away.”

He said this simply as Caulifla was fuming “What!?”

“You lack discipline, respect and care. Go away” He said simply. This caused her to understandably, go furious.

“What! You will train me you sack of shit!” She shouted as she rushed Vegeta. Planning on making him pay. With a fist she went straight for his face.

Which failed as Vegeta blocked her arm and tossed her away. Caulifla caught herself and went for another hit. This time he dodged to the side, showing no care as he jabbed her straight into the gut.

Didn’t knock her away, but it hurt like hell. “Ahh! You-”

“You won’t beat me” He said simply, Caulifla getting angry as she went for another punch. No variety. He blocked this one, and this time kicked straight down. Straight in the face as she flew through the building. Crashing through. Dust up everywhere

“Uh... Big Sis, what do you me to do?” Kale said who was just watching Caulifla get dismissed.

“Hit! Him!” Was all she could say. Kale faced Vegeta, trembling from fear. She can’t even go Super Saiyan with so much fear. She came at Vegeta. Going for... another punch. He was ready to block this and counter with little effort.

But it was a fake out. Cause when she brought her punch closer, her leg came in from the side. Of course Vegeta caught the leg but he was impressed.

“You saw what i was expecting, and you used it to your advantage. Seems like your better then your loud mouth friend over there” Vegeta said as Kale blushed. A compliment?

“You bastard!” Caulifla said as she has officially recovered. Flying at Vegeta with her top speed. Only to get Kale hurled to her and land in another building. Dust every where as they crash in the room.

“Ow...” Kale said as her head hit something hard. She looked forward and saw... a gun? Reading it she saw... “Um big sis...”

“That bastard! He’s gonna pay!” Caulifla said as she flew back. Little care as she attacked Vegeta. Who easily countered all her attacks. This time he was planning to lay the idea in her head.

Once he got the chance, he countered. A hit to the head, only to be followed by several more hits. Caulifla was getting beaten by Vegeta as Kale flew up. Now with the gun as she flew up.

“Big Sis... get away!” She said aiming the gun at the fight.

Caulifla heard this and formed her hands together. Shooting a Ki blast that she her going down. Away from Vegeta with Momentum. She then shot one at Vegeta. This was easy to break away. With a simple hit.

It wasn’t an attack though, it was a distraction. He felt something hit his side as he paused. Seeing the other Saiyan girl hit him with a beam.

Suddenly, a giant dust cloud surrounded him. Both of the Saiyan girls watch as _________________

155312222212.content:
When the dust finally came down, both Kale and Caulifla looked at the dust, not seeing Vegeta’s once big frame. It was almost like he disappeared, which made her a bit confused. More then a bit really, but real confused. Suddenly they watched something fall towards the ground. Falling fast and going down to the ground. It took a while, but both Caulifla and Kale saw what it was, or more accurately what it was.

“Catch it quick!” Caulifla said as she started flying towards it. Catching up and holding her hand ready for the impact. It landed right down as she looked, seeing that the small figure that fell was the once powerful Vegeta.

For Vegeta, he did not know what happened, until he looked up at the giant Saiyan girl that was holding him. Of course furious about this. “What!!! How dare you!”

“Hahaha!” Caulifla said laughing “Not talking so big now are you! Hahaha!”

“Shut up!” Vegeta said as he was not happy. Kale came right up to Caulifla, looking down at the small Vegeta and having him send her an angry glare. She shyly back up, but Caulifla was just laughing this whole time

“What did you do to him Kale?” Caulifla said eyeing the device in her hand.

“It... it’s a shrink ray. I found it while i was sent through the building” She admittedly timidly. Down below Vegeta was cursing his inventor of a wife. Why did she have to make that blasted thing

“Cool!” Caulifla said as she then felt Vegeta stand up. Facing Kale he barked at her.

“Change me back this instant!” He shouted, getting the girl to whimper. He was small, but he was still intimidating to her. To her at least, not to Caulifla.

Seeing the outburst, she moved her finger down and pushed it down onto Vegeta’s chest. Holding him down as she smiled wide about about this. He was struggling but he was so small that it was effectively useless.

“Hahaha, not only did it shrink you. It made you even smaller, and you can’t even fly. This is hilarious”

“Let me go!” He said to her as he tried to lift off her finger, but didn’t work at all.

“No way puny price” She said making fun “This is perfect. You want to get big, you got to do what we want. And your gonna help us get to Super Saiyan God”

He was fuming right now. Seeing that his options were limited, very limited. Seeing the giant girl smile down to him, he had no idea how he was going to respond to this “Ahh!!!”

She laughed louder as she moved down around the corner. The portal was still open and Caulifla “Think about it this time, at least your gonna see Sadala. Hahaha”

“Let go!” He shouted as Caulifla just ignored him. She went back into the portal. It was linked to their hideout, and it was set to disappear once a return happened.

Which it thankfully did. Arriving back into her hideout it went away. Meaning there was no way they were gonna be traced or found. Caulifla smiled as she headed upstairs to her throne. Thinking it was only fitting for her to go there. She dropped Vegeta down onto the ground, having little care for the saiyan who just put a beat down on her. She smiled wide as she headed off and sat down onto the seat.

“Now, your gonna tell us exactly how to get to Super Saiyan God” She said down to the prince who was by her feet “Your gonna tell me right now”

When she said this, Vegeta did not know what to do or say. He didn’t want to be small. The once powerful prince getting turned to a joke and a toy. At the same time though, he refuses to bend his will and bend his pride. These two have no deserved it. That was for sure.

“No” He said back to her standing tall. Well as tall as he possibly could.

“What?” Caulifla said as she was not happy about the back talk

“I won’t tell you two. No matter what you do to me!” She said as Caulifla was not happy about this. Not one bit. Kale just got to the side and judging from her Big Sis’s reaction. It was not very good. She didn’t want to speak up right now. Not wanting to anger her friend. Just like Vegeta did.

It was probably not the smartest choice he has ever made. But it was the only one his pride really allowed him to do. He was not going to bend his will for the sake of these girls. Something they did not really like, that much was clear.  Caulifla was not happy, and she shifted her foot forward. Trapping him right her sole. The powerless Saiyan couldn’t lift her foot of him, and that really got to him. he has spent his entire life training to be the strongest, and he lost all of that in one instant. It was clear he was not happy about this. He tried to lift the foot off him but Caulifla held him down hard.

“You know what, fine don’t be our teacher. You i was going to be nice, you teach us how to go God and i was gonna grow you big again. Simple as that, but you had to be a stubborn son of a bitch. So i’m gonna keep you as small as long as i want. I will make you ask you to give me Super Saiyan god. Got that you puny prince” She said with so much joy in her voice. She always liked being stronger then others, and now it was with a Saiyan who was just moping the floor with her before. The reversal was exhilarating.

After a while she lifted her foot, smiling down as Kale saw just how much she enjoyed the power.

“Now i think we should ___________”

As Kale soared through the sky she couldn't help but smile as she thought of the perfect instructor for herself. If she remembered right from Caulifla and Goku's conversations, the male Saiyan and had a human wife who was a retired Martial Artist... Ch-Chi she recalled.

She was an ex-martial artist that spent most of her time cooking, cleaning, and making sure her children studied for whatever future endeavors they set their minds too. She probably couldn't even keep up with a Saiyan, let alone train with one like herself, and that made her the perfect trainer.

She was a Saiyan after all so she knew she was tough as nails and twice as stubborn, she could make it in there for however long she kept her. Yes, she loved Kale like a sister but this was going a tad too far. She didn't like her like that and she liked being sandwiched between her boobs even less.

"Seriously, when I get back to normal I'm gonna put Kale through the ringer." Caulifla mumbled as she tried her best to get comfortable. As loath as she was to admit it there wasn't much she could do in this situation. It was just like she said earlier, she was her protegee now until further notice.

Caulifla sighed. "This sucks."

----------

"Hmmhmm!" Chi-Chi hummed as she finished washing the dishes Goku left behind. She'd long since gotten used to how much her husband could eat, but the cleanup at the end was never fun. She could always ask him to wash a dish or two, though she had a feeling that would end in disaster. Still, the thought was nice.

The human woman began to dry her hands as she thought of what to do next. Goku was off training with Whis and Vegeta, and Goten was at Capsule Corps. with Trunks. All the chores where finished and her dad wasn't due by today for a visit.

"Huh? I actually have some free time." Chi-Chi remarked. How long had it been since she had that?

*DING DONG*

Kale took a deep breath, "Will you train with me!?"
