155332211.content:
You opened your eyes after randomly blacking out in the middle of....... you don't remember. In fact, you don't remember anything! Your name, your age, your entire life up to this point has been completely wiped from your mind. Looking around, you notice another shocking fact about your predicament. everything around you seems to be WAY bigger than it should be. Grass that was shoulder height to you, trees that towered over you like skyscrapers. You were either incredibly small, or you were in a world of giants.

Suddenly, the ground was shaking beneath you. it wasn't like an earthquake where the shaking is constant, it felt like...... footsteps, like something massive was walking towards you......

BOOM!! A large, dark pink object slammed down in front of front of you, sending you flying back. While you stumbled to your feet, you heard a feminine voice say: "What a beautiful view! I think I'll stay here and admire this lovely world before Helles-sama gives her gorgeous, divine judgement." You watched from a far (to you) distance as this green-haired giantess laid out a blanket and sat down on it, just looking into the distance. It was a great view, the sun setting over some mountains and a great valley below them, but you were too busy debating with yourself whether or not it would be a good idea to reveal yourself to this woman. While she does seem nice, her gushing over this Helles person made you think that she might be some fanatic, which you didn't want to get involved with. Eventually you decided that you might as well reveal yourself, you'd rather not stick around and find out what this "divine judgement" is.

Walking around her, you made it to her feet as she was sitting whilst leaning back, her arms supporting her torso. You start jumping up and down while waving your arms and yelling "DOWN HERE!" The green-haired woman seemed to notice your voice but couldn't quite pinpoint where you were, You start tapping her foot to try
and help her find you. She looked down at her feet and finally noticed you. She then reached for you, her hand completely shutting you off from the outside world.....

She opened her hand and the world came back into view, only now her face was right in front of you, making you realized just how insignificant you were. "What a small creature, I wonder what it is?" She said, her breath washing over you as she talked, it smelled minty and sweet, as if this girl washed her mouth with peppermint tea. Her teeth were blindingly white, she clearly took great care of herself. You were uncomfortably close to her mouth, you could feel the warmth radiating from it, it looked like it would just suck you in and eat you like some piece of food.

Goku gulped and looked towards the sky, his entire vision sky was filled with the terrifying sight of a giantess, as he craned his neck up the shoes connected to a pair of what appeared to be baggy purple pants that stretched up towards an extremely toned bare midriff, from there the sight of two enormous orbs that were Caulifla’s huge breasts that were barely being contained by a pink tube top and finally his eyes rested on the beautiful yet frightening face of the saiyan who was smiling menacingly down at him. Goku shuddered, at least when she was fused as Kefla she had some of Kale’s niceness and mercy, but Caulifla was something completely different.

“Well well well. Looks like I found my little toy haha” Caulifla laughed down at her tiny plaything as she was relieved that she found him once more, she was a little annoyed that the fusion wore off early but at least now she could have her full way with little tiny Goku. Meanwhile at her feet behind Goku the mother and son began to cry at their predicament and immedietly began to run away only to run into a large solid object. They opened their eyes and shuddered . “Erm big sis I fou...” Kale began but she was interrupted by her mentor, “Not now Kale can’t you see I’m a little busy with my favourite toy?” Caulifla replied bluntly and she reached down and wrapped her tree trunk like fingers aroun and Goku and brought him up to her face. “Thought you could escape me didn’t you Son Goku? Well you’re never getting away from me, you’re mine forever...or at least until you start to bore me ahaha” Caulifla began laughing once more as she became turned on at the thought of having the strongest warrior in all the universes in the palm of her hand.

“Sis I” Kale began again, “WHAT IS IT KALE! WHY ATE YOU BOTHERING ME WHEN IM TRYING TO PLAY WITH MY TOY!?” Caulifla barked back. Caulifla noticed them and smiled as she stomped over to Kale making sure to stomp right next to where the two were standing, causing them to scream as the impact of Caulifla’s foot knocked them off theirs.

“Oh i dunno...maybe I should stomp them flat like we did to their daddy” Caulifla raised her foot over the two as she said this which only made the two scream louder. “Nah that’s way to easy...tell you what my awesome apprentice, since you did so well in the tournament of power I’ll give you a present, two in fact.
